story:
Will This Photographer's Dream Come True?

"Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around for a while, you could miss it." - Ferris Bueller's Day Off 

It’s true. Babies grow up. Friends get old. And couples get wrinkly. (#sadface)

But don’t worry, because I have magic powers.

I can freeze time. 
I can help you remember your child’s cake-smudged face on her first birthday.
I can capture the tears on your mother-in-law’s face after you say, “I do”.
I can bottle up the little moments that make our lives sweet, so you can have them forever.

This is real magic we’re talking about here. This is the power of photographs. 

My name is Michelle Rose Ziskovicz, and I was born to take these pictures.

Since I was 12, I never left the house without some picture-taking device. Today, I’m a recent graduate from Florida International University with a BFA in Photography. And now, it’s time to start the photography business I’ve been dreaming of. 

Why Michelle is totally going to rock her photography biz:

I’ve got the know-how; studied photography for 5 years.
I’ve got the reputation; families are already asking me to take their pictures.
I’ve got the business experience; started and ran a swim school for 4 years.
I’ve got the chutzpah; I was raised by my grandma from Brooklyn.

Now the only thing holding me back is a professional camera, laptop and editing software. (That's where you come in and save the day.)

What I Need To Get Started:

I need 3,000 (USD) to start my photography business, MRosePhotographer. (Website under construction.)

Your support will help fund : 

  • Pre-owned Canon E0S 70D 
  • Laptop for photo editing 
  • Adobe Photoshop CC editing software

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on facebook to help me start my business. I have 30 days to raise $3,000 so help spread the word. It means the world to me!

Love, 
Michelle 
P.S. Thanks in advance for helping make my dreams come true.

story:
Our Story

Food Forward is a 501 (c)(3) non-profit organization whose mission is to rescue fresh local produce that would otherwise go to waste, connecting this abundance with people in need and inspiring others to do the same. Since 2009, we have been been harvesting fruit from backyards and public spaces in Los Angeles, Ventura and Santa Barbara Counties. In 2012, we started collecting unsold produce from Los Angeles area farmers markets and early this year, we piloted our new Wholesale Recovery Program to collect otherwise wasted produce from the downtown Los Angeles Wholesale Produce Market. 

Our initial goal was to recover and distribute 300,000 pounds of produce in the first year of the program. We are pleased to say we have collected and donated nearly 2 million pounds in just 5 months. AND this was accomplished with a borrowed truck, operating with limited hours, only three days a week. Imagine what we could do with our own truck, running at capacity five days a week?!?

With your support, we hope to raise the funds to purchase a 24-foot box truck and begin daily collections of produce. We believe that a truck, dedicated to the Wholesale Recovery Program full-time, will allow us to grow from an average of 6 market runs a week to 12-15 runs, in effect doubling our recovery efforts.

Food Waste at the Los Angeles Wholesale Produce Market



What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $40,000 in 40 days to purchase a 24-foot box truck. This truck will collect and distribute produce that would otherwise be thrown away from the Wholesale Produce Market in Downtown Los Angeles.

As a thank you for your tax-deductible contribution, we have put together some fruity perks: 

$10 - Help us collect 500 pounds of produce AND get a fruity shout-out on social media.  (unlimited)

$25 - Help us collect 1,250 pounds of produce AND get a postcard of the Food Forward team with the new Wholesale truck.  (unlimited) 

$50 - Help us collect 2,500 pounds of produce, get a postcard of the team in front of the new Wholesale truck AND a Food Forward sticker. (unlimited)

$75 - Help us collect 3,750 pounds of produce AND get a Limited Edition Fruitanthropist T-shirt.  (100)

$100 - Help us collect 5,000 pounds of produce AND get an awesome heavy-duty multi-pocketed beach-worthy Food Forward Canvas Tote Bag.  (75)

$200 - Help us collect 10,000 pounds of produce AND receive a Food Forward Limited Edition Signed/Numbered 5th Anniversary Print.  (10)

$250 - Help us collect AN ENTIRE TRUCKLOAD (12,500 pounds) of produce AND receive an exclusive invite to a Jam Making Class led by Food Forward Founder/Executive Director Rick Nahmias.  (30)

$500 - Help us collect TWO ENTIRE TRUCKLOADS OF PRODUCE (25,000 pounds) AND get your name emblazoned on our new Wholesale Market Recovery Truck.  (50)

$1,000 - Help us collect 50,000 pounds of produce, get your name emblazoned on our new Wholesale Market Recovery Truck AND join the Food Forward family for a private donor cocktail party at the Fruit Cave.  (25)

$2,500 - Help us collect 125,000 pounds of produce, get your name emblazoned on our new Wholesale Market Recovery Truck AND gather 15 of your closest friends & family for a Private Pick with members of the Food Forward crew.  (4)  *Location and time/date is subject to Mother Nature and Food Forward's current geographic capabilities.

$5,000 - Help us collect 250,000 pounds of produce, get your name emblazoned on our new Wholesale Market Recovery Truck, join the Food Forward Family for a cocktail party at the Fruit Cave AND take a ride in the new Truck to the downtown Los Angeles Wholesale Produce Market for an insider tour with our Wholesale Market Manager, Luis.  (2) *Time/date is subject to mutual availability and Los Angeles Wholesale Market hours of operation.

All donations are tax-deductible, as allowed by law.

Food Forward (Tax id #90-0678872) 


    The Impact

    In greater Los Angeles, 2.4 million people are food insecure, many with little to no access to fresh fruits and vegetables. In just 5 years, Food Forward has become a bridge, connecting fresh unused produce with agencies serving hundreds of thousands of our region's neediest. We plan to continue and expand upon this work with the Wholesale Recovery Program - redirecting the enormous waste of 90 - 100% perfectly edible produce thrown away at the Los Angeles Wholesale Produce Market. 

    Your INVESTMENT in this truck will yield nutritious returns for years to come, helping us launch this new era in fighting hunger and preventing food waste. A new truck will allow us to distribute over ONE MILLION additional servings PER MONTH of fresh free local produce to more than 200 hunger-relief and social service agencies, 100% donated free of charge.


    The Programs of Food Forward

    Over the past five years, with the help of a volunteer corps of 7,000+ individuals, Food Forward has rescued OVER 4 million pounds of fruits and vegetables, donating through three programs: Backyard Harvesting, Farmers Market Recovery and, now, Wholesale Market Recovery. 

    Wholesale Produce Market Recovery conducts systematic rescue of fresh, unsold produce from wholesale vendors in downtown Los Angeles. This program rescues massive amounts of produce, connecting this abundance with the largest hunger-relief, food distribution agencies across the region.

    Backyard Harvesting conducts 100% volunteer-powered picks on both private and public properties throughout Los Angeles and Ventura Counties. This program not only delivers fresh produce to agencies serving those in need, but also brings awareness to our community to look at the fruit hanging in their own backyards as a way to combat hunger.

    Farmers Market Recovery offers the only formal, market-endorsed donation system in the region for farmers wanting to help fight hunger with their unsold produce. First piloted in 2012, this program currently operates at 11 markets. Each week over 30 hunger relief and social service agencies benefit from the unsold, nutritious and seasonal produce collected by volunteer Glean Teams from the nearly 200 generous farmers market vendors we partner with.

    Over 200 direct service agencies distribute our donated produce to the hungry across three counties. The recipients of Food Forward recovered produce include dozens of demographics: children, women, the elderly and disabled, people living with HIV/AIDS, veterans, immigrants, food insecure college students, farm workers, the homeless and many many more. Recipient agencies include: SOVA Food & Resource Center, MEND Poverty, Union Mission, Gay & Lesbian Elder Housing, Westside Foodbank, Catholic Charities, People Assisting the Homeless (PATH), Downtown Women's Center, Valley Interfaith Council, Los Angeles Regional Food Bank, Under The Bridges, Heart of Compassion, St. Francis Center, Project Chicken Soup and Boys & Girls Clubs. 

    We invite you to invest in Food Forward's new era of fighting hunger and preventing food waste in Southern California.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Interested in supporting Food Forward but don't have the funds to help with this campaign? We have tons of other ways you can get involved!

    Volunteer: We are always looking for enthusiastic volunteers to get up in the trees and pick fruit, help us out at our 11 Los Angeles-area farmers markets or lend us their office skills. To sign up for one of our many volunteer events visit: www.foodforward.org/events

    Got Fruit Trees? Register your tree here: http://foodforward.org/get-involved/property-owners/

    Ask your company to get involved by participating in a Private Group Event or matching donations. Email ericag@foodforward.org for more information. 

    Don't forget to share is with your friends by liking us on Facebook and following us on Twitter!

story:
Who Be These Strangers?

Hello!  We are The Lilith, a party room at Convergence!  Which, as you know, is just about the raddest nerd convention in the Midwest happening every July.  We provide congoers with games, alcohol and an ambiance that inspires them to pillage and plunder with all the zeal a pirate should have!

We require some booty so that we can provide the alcohol, games and ambiance that Convergence attendees deserve.  Basically the more money we get: the better quality booze we can afford.

"But pirates, I don't drink alcohol!"

That's awesome!  We're also providing a non-alcoholic juice option.  This ain't no koolaid: we're actually mixing drinks for those who aren't old enough or just plain don't want to get all liquored up.  We got your backs.

What Plunder Do They Offer?

We need $1000.  

"BLACKBEARD'S BOOTY, that's a lot!" you might say.  However, we need to pay for the hotel (three night stay, unfortunately not cheap) and all the alcohol.  Also, to get the beds removed (it's expensive to not have big, bulky beds in there...)  We also  need to rebuild the ships for Pirate Beer Pong.  You heard me right.  Pirate Beer Pong, where you set your cups on model ships and use cannons to shoot the ping pong balls.  It's great.  But we need new ships, as the old ones ran aground on some reefs the year before.

We also need decorations for the room.  While it's been fun to get away with a blank hotel room with vaguely piratey posters, this year we would like to make the experience more immersive.  What that entails will be entirely up to the funds we are able to raise.  These decorations will be used from year to year, so this will be the only time we need to make this expense.

But don't worry, if you scratch our salty, tattooed backs, we are there to scratch yours.  We'll have special drinks for our donors.  An invitation to the Captain's Table Party, a piratey potluck that takes place on the first night before the room opens.  Patches to sew onto your pirate vests.  Badge ribbons so you can tell everyone else how awesome we think you are.  Drinking mugs so you can gloat over your coffee.  All highly sought after items!

Our bare minimum to run the room is $1000.  We would like to meet it and maybe even surpass it so that we can have an AMAZING party!  Any money that doesn't get used is being set in an account for the next year, so when we come to you with hat in hand, we don't need to ask for quite so much.



Why Should I Care?

"Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and the world."

Contributor... patron?  Benefactor?  No!  Privateer!  Whatever.  Person reading this with money in hand, why should you donate to us?

Well, running a party room isn't a cheap venture.  We think The Lilith provides an atmosphere to Convergence that you don't get at a lot of other conventions.  We aren't some rich organization that makes enough money every year to pay for our expenses.  We're just a couple of nerds who think it's great when we've got a packed hotel room full of people dancing and having fun.  We love watching teams trash talk each other over the Beer Pong and leave the room happier than when they enter.  We get giddy and bouncy when we have repeat customers.  Heck, last year - MONTHS after Con had ended - someone came up to me and complimented me on the room.

THIS is why we do it.  And this is why we pay for the party out of our own pockets.

But we can do more.  We know we can do so much more and are just limited by our small budgets.


But What if They Sail Off the Edge of the Earth?

It's hard to think of risks or challenges because there aren't really any.  The only risk is if we don't get enough donations and need to throw together a slapdash room with weak alcohol.  And nobody wants that.  But honestly, its as simple as: The more money we get, The better the party is.

We in the crew are all millenials in our mid-20's.  We'll be able to throw a party together with nothing if we ABSOLUTELY have to.  But that's not what Con is about, and that's not what we're about and we don't want to provide you with slapdash.  We want to provide you with plunder!



How Can I Help Without Money?

For one, you can share this campaign!  Stress to your friends how much you NEED us to make our goal!  Ask your rich uncle if he remembers his childhood dream of being a pirate, and if he could support some people with the same dream. 

Work on your Beer Pong game so you can come and be amazing at our tournament!

But really.  Share this on your Facebooks... your Twitters... your LiveJournals.  Do people still MySpace?

story:
Si vous désirez offrir un cadeau à Pascal et Raymonde pour leur 50ième anniversaire de mariage vous pouvez le faire ici.

Sinon, si vous préférez, vous pourrez leur remettre en main propre ou dans le panier à cet effet le 4 juillet!

story:
The FlowingBusiness.com Story

Hi, my name is Patrick Dague and we’ve got some great perks!

FlowingBusiness.com is a membership website that will allow the millions of small business owners out there, even those with limited internet skills, to put up “searchable” online video-coupon offers with a “print-coupon” option. We also offer free training plus low cost services for those who want it. 

Links to live Member video-coupon offers are shown further below... 

Please watch the short video above and the 2 minute introductory video on our Home Page at www.FlowingBusiness.com to learn more. This will grow fast so being an early affiliate, which is a perk every donor gets, is a powerful spot to have! 

 

Members Can Set-up an Online Coupon Offer in Minutes!

Our members can set up an internet video-coupon, or alternatively a coupon without video, within just a few minutes. The coupons include fields for keywords to help them get found in local search results. (43% of all Google searches include a city, neighborhood or zip code – we make sure those parameters are included.)

 

Members Get Coupon Capability, Free Training & Low Cost Services

To bring new members “in the door” we let them join free, which allows them to create and preview video coupon offers. However our members have to upgrade to a paid GOLD MEMBERSHIP to publish their business coupon offers live on the internet.

We give all members (free members too) immediate access to our extensive free training on the most important internet business development tools, such as Facebook Timeline business pages, Google Places (now Google+ Local), Twitter, LinkedIn and more. The free training is offered in an easy-to-understand framework.

For those who want it “done for them” we also offer low cost services to set up those same internet business development tools. The bottom line is that with our help any small or medium-sized businesses can quickly develop a strong online presence and bring in a lot more clients, customers or patients!

In a nutshell, FlowingBusiness.com helps non-internet savvy people – and again there are millions of them – to get:(1) a coupon offer for their business quickly up online and easily found, along with (2) loads of good free training in a well structured easy-to-use  format, and (3) low cost help if they want us to do it for them.

 

Online Coupon Offers: Two Key Requirements

First, market research from several large companies shows that about half (50%) of all new business that walks in the door these days is the result of a Google search.

Second, the research proves that 87% of all consumers will use a coupon if available.

The Obvious Conclusion: Showing up in Google searches with a coupon, especially a video coupon, is a powerful combination. It works. That is the primary unique benefit we offer our members. Our website gives small business owners the perfect platform to make it happen.

Gold Members can post an unlimited number of printable coupons, with a video option if they want to use it. Each one of those coupons will show up as a separate online page in Google searches.

 

Two actual client examples:

http://flowingbusiness.com/day-chiropractic-clearlake-ca-special-offer/

http://flowingbusiness.com/considering-spinal-surgery/

And an example of a post without a coupon, which is an available alternative:

http://flowingbusiness.com/discuss-all-options-with-your-doctor-before-doing-surgery-2/

A Gold Membership, which allows posting an unlimited number of coupons and special offers live on the internet, is just $29.00 per month.

 

A Similar Site Success Story!

A somewhat similar website that allows paid members to make business posts is not a coupon site; it is a business development site for Realtors. That site, http://activerain.com/, allows members to make posts about their business online. They charge $39.00 per month.

If you click the above link you will see on their Home Page (top right under “Sign Up”) they have over 220,000 members!! 

Our potential market is much bigger because we can offer online video coupons to any business, including Realtors! In fact our “Free Consultation” coupon offer is PERFECT for Realtors willing to give a free opinion of value to get a new listing!

 

Why We Need Help

OUR WEBSITE IS NOT QUITE READY YET!  A computer crash corrupted files and created directory errors that were then unfortunately copied into our backup copy of the site due to operator error. FlowingBusiness.com is now about 90% rebuilt (with multiple backups!) and even better than it was before! However rebuilding it cost time and money and as a result we've now run short of cash to complete and launch the website. We're really excited about it, but we need funds to finish and launch it!

 

What We Need to Do to Finish and Launch

We still need to (1) set up a payment gateway, (2) get our services-offered pages finished, (3) finalize relationships with a few contract workers to provide the services offered, (4) set up and test our affiliate program, (5) get dozens of test clients and then test, test, test like crazy for one or two months, (6) then move the website to a super-fast cloud server and then (7) launch our marketing program.

I can bootstrap much of that but I honestly need about $8,500 for costs and expenses, including some high-end professional help, while I finish the website and we ramp it up. That includes a little bit of money for promoting the website both online and offline, although once launched my business plan shows it moving quickly into profitability.  

THIS IS GOING TO HAPPEN – there is no way I’m quitting – but there is not $8.5K sitting around and available, which is what I need to do it right. And it had better be right because once launched we expect it to grow fast!

If we do not reach our full goal the funds will be spent on getting the payment gateway and services-offered page set-up. That way at least I can start selling it while I finish it piece-by-piece after that!

 

How You Can Help

Please make a donation and claim a reward! EVERYONE who donates, unless they say otherwise, will receive:

 * Their NAME on our “FOUNDERS” PAGE -

 * AN AFFILIATE LINK so you can REFER NEW MEMBERS AND GET PAID! 


ADDITIONAL REWARDS at each level:

$5.00

(1) You get a certificate for a THREE MONTH FREE Gold Membership you can keep or give away, valued at $87.00 and (2) you will show up as a Bronze Level “Founder” on our “Founders” Page, plus (3) YOU get an affiliate link!.

$10.00

(1) You get a certificate for a ONE YEAR FREE Gold Membership you can keep or give away, valued at $348.00 and (2) you will show up as a Silver Level “Founder” on our “Founders” Page, plus (3) YOU get an affiliate link!

$25.00

(1) You get a certificate for a THREE YEAR FREE Gold Membership you can keep or give away, valued at $1,044.00 and (2) you will show up as a GOLD Level “Founder” on our “Founders” Page, plus (3) the extra perk of your picture on our Founder's page plus (4) YOU get an affiliate link!

$50.00

(1) You get a certificate for a FREE Gold Membership for SEVEN FULL YEARS you can keep or give away, valued at $2,436.00 and (2) you will show up as a PLATINUM Level “Founder” on our “Founders” Page, plus (3) the extra perk of BOTH your picture and a company logo on our Founder's page.

$100.00

(1) You get a certificate for a FREE Gold Membership for FIFTEEN FULL YEARS you can keep or give away, valued at $3,480.00, (2) you will show up as a DIAMOND Level “Founder” on our “Founders” Page, plus (3) the extra perks of a WEBSITE LINK and BOTH your picture AND a company logo on our Founder's page, and (4) you will get up to one hour of personal assistance from Patrick Dague or a qualified staff member in creating a video-coupon offer for your business or a business of your choice, plus (5) YOU get an affiliate link!

$500.00

(1) You get a certificate for a FREE Gold Membership for FIFTEENEN FULL YEARS you can keep or give away, valued at $5,220.00, (2) you will show up as a BRIGHT STAR “Founder” on our “Founders” Page, plus (3) the extra perks of a WEBSITE LINK and BOTH your picture AND a company logo on our Founder's page, (4) you will get up to five hours of personal assistance in creating video-coupon offers for your business or a business of your choice, and (5) you will get personal help in making and editing a video for your business, plus (6) YOU get an affiliate link!.

$1,000.00

(1) You get a certificate for a LIFETIME FREE Gold Membership you can keep or give away, valued at an estimated $18,000.00, (2) you will show up as a SUPER NOVA “Founder” on our “Founders” Page, plus (3) the extra perks of a WEBSITE LINK and BOTH your picture AND a company logo on our Founder's page, (4) you will get up to 10 hours of personal assistance in creating video-coupon offers for your business or a business of your choice, (5) you will get personal help in making and editing a video for your business, and (6) you will get an overall internet marketing review for your business or a business of your choice, (7) YOU get an affiliate link!.

Alternative Perk:

Donate any dollar amount you wish and as an alternative to the above rewards you will receive a gift certificate payable to anyone of your choice for six times the dollar amount donated. That gift certificate will be applicable to any service or product offered by FlowingBusiness.com. That could make a great gift for someone you know!

Membership Perks will be available almost immediately after funding closes. The others will be available within about 45 days.

If we are fortunate enough to exceed our goal, the extra funds will help recoup the start up costs that have already been spent and allow for a faster launch with more money for marketing.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that times are tough for everyone financially.  So if you can't contribute to our campaign, please spread the word via email, use the Share tools on this website, and tell friends about us with Facebook, Twitter, or any other way that you think would help raise awareness and money. Thank you for your time and support!  Patrick Dague

story:
UPDATE: See below for an english description!

 

Unsere Vision ist es, einen Online-Marktplatz zu schaffen, auf dem Bedürfnisse der Dienstleister im Mittelpunkt stehen.

Für qualitativ hochwertige Kreativdienstleistungen gibt es bisher keinen Onlinemarkt. Im Tagesgeschäft wird der richtige Dienstleister nicht wegen des Preises, sondern primär aufgrund des Vertrauens in dessen Fähigkeiten vergeben. Alle bestehenden Konzepte, die diese Dienste über das Internet zu vermitteln versuchen, resultieren in einem Preiskampf der Leistungserbringer.

Wir ermöglichen es den Anbietern sich so zu präsentieren, wie Sie es bei einem Pitch im alltäglichen Arbeitsablauf gewohnt sind. Wir bringen die weichen Faktoren wie Sympathie und Vertrauen ins Internet. pitchbridge nutzen bedeutet, zu wissen mit wem man um was konkurriert und für großen Aufwand sogar entschädigt zu werden.

Die Kunden auf Nachfrageseite erhalten strukturierte und professionelle Hilfe bei der Analyse ihres Bedarfs und der Erstellung einer Projektausschreibung. Sie können den Kreis der möglichen Anbieter nach ihren Präferenzen eingrenzen und auf die Kompetenz und Fähigkeit der Teilnehmer vertrauen.

So sparen sich die Kunden den Weg zu mehreren Agenturen und die Zeit für die stets ähnlichen Erstgespräche. Die Anbieter erhalten einen neuen Vertriebskanal und können die Anzahl der Arbeiten, die nicht zu einem Geschäftsabschluss führen, minimieren.

Diesen Service (Aufwand und Zeiteinsatz minimieren, Effizienz der Vermittlung steigern) bietet pitchbridge exklusiv an und generiert durch Vermittlungsprovisionen Umsatz.

Wir – Ray und Alex – kennen uns seit über 13 Jahren. Kreativ und unternehmungslustig waren wir schon immer, aber jetzt wagen wir den Sprung ins kalte Wasser. Die Fähigkeiten zur Umsetzung bringen wir mit. Was wir nicht wissen, lernen wir. Was wir nicht können oder wollen, vergeben wir in vertrauensvolle Hände. Wir trauen uns diesen Schritt zu und freuen uns auf euer Vertrauen und eure Unterstützung. Wir möchten etwas Eigenes schaffen, von dem viele Menschen profitieren. Dienstleistungen sollten nach Wert bezahlt werden, nicht nach dem Preis.

Um eine Demoversion unserer Webapplikation und der dahinter liegenden Datenbank vorantreiben zu können, benötigen wir ca. 10.000€ Startkapital.

Mit dem über Indiegogo eingesammelten Geld werden wir außerdem die ersten Messebesuche finanzieren. Überschussmittel sollen die Kosten der Anbieterakquise etwas abschwächen. Wir wollen mit einer Demoversion Investoren überzeugen können. Neben der Präsentation der Funktion wollen wir zeigen, dass wir es ernst meinen und mit unserem eigenen Kapital hinter unserer Idee stehen.

Wir freuen uns über jeden, der an unsere Idee glaubt und wer bereit ist, uns Geld zur Verfügung zu stellen, der wird dafür belohnt! Wir haben ganz exklusive Perks entwickelt, mit denen ihr den besonderen Service unseres Projektes stark reduziert in Anspruch nehmen könnt.

Ihr könnt euch das Recht erwerben auf unseren Seiten genannt und verlinkt zu werden, um so von unserem wachsenden Bekanntheitsgrad zu profitieren. Ihr habt hier die Möglichkeit frühzeitig Vergünstigungen für unsere Premium-Accounts zu erlangen, die nach Liveschaltung unserer Plattform ein Vielfaches des hier gehandelten Preises kosten werden. Wenn ihr das Potenzial unserer Geschäftsidee bereits erkannt habt, bekommt ihr hier die Gelegenheit euch die Vermittlungsleistung für einen Bruchteil der später anfallenden Vermittlungsgebühr zu sichern. Für eine Großveranstaltung, die ein Projektvolumen von 150.000€ hat, liegt Dank der 500€ für unseren größten Perk die Provision für euch bei nur knapp 0,3% - ihr spart also über 1000€!

Für den unwahrscheinlichen Fall, dass wir unser Funding-Ziel nicht erreichen sollten: Eure Spenden gehen nicht verloren. pitchbridge wird live gehen, egal wie diese Kampagne ausgeht. Die Perks bestehen, das ist also garantiert! Aufgeben gehört nicht zum Wortschatz der Gründer – Rückzug oder Aufgeben ist also keine Option ;)

Nicht jeder kann oder will Geld investieren – das wissen wir. Aber helfen kann uns dennoch jeder!

Auch wenn ihr keine Perks von uns erwerben könnt oder wollt, freuen wir uns über jede Form der Unterstützung. Auf Indiegogo werden alle Kampagnen mit einem „Gogo-Faktor“ bewertet. Unser Erfolg an diesem Gründungswettbewerb hängt von unserem Gogo-Faktor ab! Wenn euch unser Konzept gefällt, erzählt es bitte weiter! Ob via Twitter oder Facebook, per E-Mail oder durch Weiterleitung des Projekt-Links – ihr unterstützt uns dadurch sehr! Mit diesem Wettbewerb haben wir die einmalige Möglichkeit bis zu 10.000€, zusätzlich zu dem hier gesammelten Geld, von Google Deutschland zu erhalten. Mit diesem Gewinn könnten wir richtig durchstarten!

Also investiert, empfehlt und sprecht über uns! In wenigen Jahren könnt ihr behaupten, ihr wart einer der ersten, der von pitchbridge wusste und daran geglaubt hat!

 

We envision an online marketplace that focusses on the needs of the service providers.

Up until now we haven’t seen a marketplace for services that is provider-oriented or is able to attract the right people in order to offer high quality services. In day to day business, providers are chosen based on trust and due to their skills – not because their offer is the cheapest. With the existing online concepts in this area it all comes down to the same thing in the end: a price war between the suppliers.

We’re forging an online environment which allows suppliers to present themselves and their services the same way, they’d be able to in daily business. We introduce all the soft skills, the trust and the transparency into an online marketplace. To use pitchbridge means that

-       you know who you are specifically pitching for,

-       who you are in competition with and,

-       you are compensated for your pitching efforts even without winning it, if the job is big enough.

 

Our customers on the demand side get to experience the first central search platform for service-specific suppliers. They receive skilled and structured support with analyzing their demand and submitting their project tender. Our service actually allows you to find the right supplier based on your preferences and needs, making it possible to trust and judge supplier’s competencies.

 

Customers save themselves the time and money for initial interviews. Suppliers gain a new sales channel and are able to minimize their failure stats on quotes.

 

This service (smart utilization of time and resources, efficiently boosting matching successes) is exclusively offered on pitchbridge. The platform itself makes it money on the provision of successful matchings.

 

We, Ray and Alex, have known each other for over 13 years now. We’re creative and risk-taking and ready to leap headfirst into the shark tank. We trust ourselves with having the right skills to get it done. The stuff we don’t know, we’ll learn. The stuff we can’t do (or don’t want to) we’ll handover to trustworthy partners. We believe in ourselves and are ready to prove it – all it takes is a little bit of support, be it financially or morally. We’d like to build something that we can be proud of, something with impact, something a lot of people will benefit from.

We’d like to put value back on the map of a price-driven online market.

 

Support us by funding a presentable version of our service so that we can demonstrate its awesomeness to our future investors.

 

The collected funds help us with customer acquisition and venture capitalists. Travelling at current gas prices is damn expensive. Plus, there’s stuff like food, rent and entry fees startup founders have to consider. So guys immediately impact our ability to visit conventions, network meetings and getting a working showcase version of our service. We’ve invested our own money already but every additional Cent counts – help us get there faster and well prepared!

 

We’re happy about every believing supporter. Our perks, which are guaranteed in delivery, make a donation worth the money! Save a bunch of money by investing today and benefit from early believer rebates later on. Or just show off and tell the world that you believed early – your name (and possible website link) will be carved in bits and bytes into the depth of our platform and promotional blog.

 

Even if we don’t reach our funding goal, which we neither hope nor believe, our idea is going to happen. We’re invested deeply, time- and moneywise, so giving up is not an option. Good for you, because your perks will definitely be ready to pick next year.

 

For all of you who believe, are amused, like to share or are just a little broke right now – you can still do your part!

 

Those of you who have nothing to spare can help us heaps by spreading the word. We’re participating in a contest of Google Germany and can get up to 10.000€ in price money on top of our Indiegogo campaign.

 

If you want to help us win this thing,

click,

share,

mail,

tell however and whoever you can. 

 

One day you can tell your grandchildren that in October 2012, you’ve helped by supporting pitchbridge…and all you had to do was posting it on facebook among all those duckfaces, instagram food pics and alleged quotes in Helvetica ;)

 

THANKS GUYS!

Im Tagesgeschäft wird der richtige Dienstleister nicht wegen des Preises, sondern primär aufgrund des Vertrauens in dessen Fähigkeiten vergeben. Alle bestehenden Konzepte, die diese Dienste über das Internet zu vermitteln versuchen, resultieren in einem Preiskampf der Leistungserbringer.
Wir ermöglichen es den Anbietern sich so zu präsentieren, wie Sie es bei einem Pitch im alltäglichen Arbeitsablauf gewohnt sind. Wir bringen die weichen Faktoren wie Sympathie und Vertrauen ins Internet. pitchbridge nutzen bedeutet, zu wissen mit wem man um was konkurriert und für großen Aufwand sogar entschädigt zu werden.
Die Kunden auf Nachfrageseite erhalten strukturierte und professionelle Hilfe bei der Analyse ihres Bedarfs und der Erstellung einer Projektausschreibung. Sie können den Kreis der möglichen Anbieter nach ihren Präferenzen eingrenzen und auf die Kompetenz und Fähigkeit der Teilnehmer vertrauen.
So sparen sich die Kunden den Weg zu mehreren Agenturen und die Zeit für die stets ähnlichen Erstgespräche. Die Anbieter erhalten einen neuen Vertriebskanal und können die Anzahl der Arbeiten, die nicht zu einem Geschäftsabschluss führen, minimieren.
Diesen Service (Aufwand und Zeiteinsatz minimieren, Effizienz der Vermittlung steigern) bietet pitchbridge exklusiv an und generiert durch Vermittlungsprovisionen Umsatz.
Wir – Ray und Alex – kennen uns seit über 13 Jahren. Kreativ und unternehmungslustig waren wir schon immer, aber jetzt wagen wir den Sprung ins kalte Wasser. Die Fähigkeiten zur Umsetzung bringen wir mit. Was wir nicht wissen, lernen wir. Was wir nicht können oder wollen, vergeben wir in vertrauensvolle Hände. Wir trauen uns diesen Schritt zu und freuen uns auf euer Vertrauen und eure Unterstützung. Wir möchten etwas Eigenes schaffen, von dem viele Menschen profitieren. Dienstleistungen sollten nach Wert bezahlt werden, nicht nach dem Preis.
Um eine Demoversion unserer Webapplikation und der dahinter liegenden Datenbank vorantreiben zu können, benötigen wir ca. 10.000€ Startkapital.
Mit dem über Indiegogo eingesammelten Geld werden wir außerdem die ersten Messebesuche finanzieren. Überschussmittel sollen die Kosten der Anbieterakquise etwas abschwächen. Wir wollen mit einer Demoversion Investoren überzeugen können. Neben der Präsentation der Funktion wollen wir zeigen, dass wir es ernst meinen und mit unserem eigenen Kapital hinter unserer Idee stehen.
Wir freuen uns über jeden, der an unsere Idee glaubt und wer bereit ist, uns Geld zur Verfügung zu stellen, der wird dafür belohnt! Wir haben ganz exklusive Perks entwickelt, mit denen ihr den besonderen Service unseres Projektes stark reduziert in Anspruch nehmen könnt.
Ihr könnt euch das Recht erwerben auf unseren Seiten genannt und verlinkt zu werden, um so von unserem wachsenden Bekanntheitsgrad zu profitieren. Ihr habt hier die Möglichkeit frühzeitig Vergünstigungen für unsere Premium-Accounts zu erlangen, die nach Liveschaltung unserer Plattform ein Vielfaches des hier gehandelten Preises kosten werden. Wenn ihr das Potenzial unserer Geschäftsidee bereits erkannt habt, bekommt ihr hier die Gelegenheit euch die Vermittlungsleistung für einen Bruchteil der später anfallenden Vermittlungsgebühr zu sichern. Für eine Großveranstaltung, die ein Projektvolumen von 150.000€ hat, liegt Dank der 500€ für unseren größten Perk die Provision für euch bei nur knapp 0,3% - ihr spart also über 1000€!
Für den unwahrscheinlichen Fall, dass wir unser Funding-Ziel nicht erreichen sollten: Eure Spenden gehen nicht verloren. pitchbridge wird live gehen, egal wie diese Kampagne ausgeht. Die Perks bestehen, das ist also garantiert! Aufgeben gehört nicht zum Wortschatz der Gründer – Rückzug oder Aufgeben ist also keine Option ;)
Nicht jeder kann oder will Geld investieren – das wissen wir. Aber helfen kann uns dennoch jeder!
Auch wenn ihr keine Perks von uns erwerben könnt oder wollt, freuen wir uns über jede Form der Unterstützung. Auf Indiegogo werden alle Kampagnen mit einem „Gogo-Faktor“ bewertet. Unser Erfolg an diesem Gründungswettbewerb hängt von unserem Gogo-Faktor ab! Wenn euch unser Konzept gefällt, erzählt es bitte weiter! Ob via Twitter oder Facebook, per E-Mail oder durch Weiterleitung des Projekt-Links – ihr unterstützt uns dadurch sehr! Mit diesem Wettbewerb haben wir die einmalige Möglichkeit bis zu 10.000€, zusätzlich zu dem hier gesammelten Geld, von Google Deutschland zu erhalten. Mit diesem Gewinn könnten wir richtig durchstarten!
Also investiert, empfehlt und sprecht über uns! In wenigen Jahren könnt ihr behaupten, ihr wart einer der ersten, der von pitchbridge wusste und daran geglaubt hat!
 
We envision an online marketplace that focusses on the needs of the service providers.
Up until now we haven’t seen a marketplace for services that is provider-oriented or is able to attract the right people in order to offer high quality services. In day to day business, providers are chosen based on trust and due to their skills – not because their offer is the cheapest. With the existing online concepts in this area it all comes down to the same thing in the end: a price war between the suppliers.
We’re forging an online environment which allows suppliers to present themselves and their services the same way, they’d be able to in daily business. We introduce all the soft skills, the trust and the transparency into an online marketplace. To use pitchbridge means that
-       you know who you are specifically pitching for,
-       who you are in competition with and,
-       you are compensated for your pitching efforts even without winning it, if the job is big enough.
 
Our customers on the demand side get to experience the first central search platform for service-specific suppliers. They receive skilled and structured support with analyzing their demand and submitting their project tender. Our service actually allows you to find the right supplier based on your preferences and needs, making it possible to trust and judge supplier’s competencies.
 
Customers save themselves the time and money for initial interviews. Suppliers gain a new sales channel and are able to minimize their failure stats on quotes.
 
This service (smart utilization of time and resources, efficiently boosting matching successes) is exclusively offered on pitchbridge. The platform itself makes it money on the provision of successful matchings.
 
We, Ray and Alex, have known each other for over 13 years now. We’re creative and risk-taking and ready to leap headfirst into the shark tank. We trust ourselves with having the right skills to get it done. The stuff we don’t know, we’ll learn. The stuff we can’t do (or don’t want to) we’ll handover to trustworthy partners. We believe in ourselves and are ready to prove it – all it takes is a little bit of support, be it financially or morally. We’d like to build something that we can be proud of, something with impact, something a lot of people will benefit from.
We’d like to put value back on the map of a price-driven online market.
 
Support us by funding a presentable version of our service so that we can demonstrate its awesomeness to our future investors.
 
The collected funds help us with customer acquisition and venture capitalists. Travelling at current gas prices is damn expensive. Plus, there’s stuff like food, rent and entry fees startup founders have to consider. So guys immediately impact our ability to visit conventions, network meetings and getting a working showcase version of our service. We’ve invested our own money already but every additional Cent counts – help us get there faster and well prepared!
 
We’re happy about every believing supporter. Our perks, which are guaranteed in delivery, make a donation worth the money! Save a bunch of money by investing today and benefit from early believer rebates later on. Or just show off and tell the world that you believed early – your name (and possible website link) will be carved in bits and bytes into the depth of our platform and promotional blog.
 
Even if we don’t reach our funding goal, which we neither hope nor believe, our idea is going to happen. We’re invested deeply, time- and moneywise, so giving up is not an option. Good for you, because your perks will definitely be ready to pick next year.
 
For all of you who believe, are amused, like to share or are just a little broke right now – you can still do your part!
 
Those of you who have nothing to spare can help us heaps by spreading the word. We’re participating in a contest of Google Germany and can get up to 10.000€ in price money on top of our Indiegogo campaign.
 
If you want to help us win this thing,
click,
share,
mail,
tell however and whoever you can. 
 
One day you can tell your grandchildren that in October 2012, you’ve helped by supporting pitchbridge…and all you had to do was posting it on facebook among all those duckfaces, instagram food pics and alleged quotes in Helvetica ;)
 
THANKS GUYS!

story:
Who is Bryan Calo of Enduring for Charity?

Hello everyone. My name is Bryan Calo and I’m an endorphin junkie. As of only this year, I became a fan of running and obstacle races. Most of these races obviously require physical endurance, but even more important is the mental strength and capacity to keep going even when the times get tough. I also ran my first marathon this year as a self-imposed first challenge for charity and we raised $1,300 for two local foundations here in San Diego. This is my second self-imposed challenge and it is going to take almost 5X the length of time as my first marathon. The challenge details are detailed below.

 

Why is this campaign important?

I've done volunteer work with "They Say It’s Your Birthday" (TSIYB), a charity that throws birthday parties for kids in foster care. The Herrick Center is the kids foster care home that we go to and as much as our activities are fun when we do birthday parties, at the end of the day, it touches me to think what these kids have had to “endure in their lives” for them to be in the foster care home. I want to bring smiles & joy to their lives, even if for just a day. I believe that with this challenge, we can collectively accomplish that goal of a real fun day for the kids.

 

What will you help achieve?

Your pledge donations will go towards taking ALL the kids in The Herrick Center foster care to a day at the movies at Cinépolis Luxury Theaters in Del Mar, CA. The foster care is limited in budget as well as for activities for the kids outside of the foster care home. I am donating my efforts and my endorphin junkie craziness on the line to be able to give a day of smiles for the kids at the foster care.

 

What we need?

We need to raise $1,070. All of that goes to fund a day at the movies, which will be at the Cinépolis Luxury Theaters. This theater has cushy seats, great movie and sound systems, servers that come to bring you food at a press of a button, all of which creates a fun and great movie going experience. I’ve spoken to the theater management and they are giving us a package deal for a movie ticket + snack combo. The raised money will afford to take over 30 kids plus the needed 10 chaperones for supervision for a fun day at the movies.

 

What is Bryan Calo going to Endure For Charity?

My challenge is to finish two events, an endurance test called The SUCK and an obstacle race right after called the Rugged Maniac.

The first event starts at 7pm at night on 10/12/2012 and goes on for 12+hrs overnight. I will be carrying a heavy rucksack full of required gear list (such as a sledgehammer, a couple of 50-lbs sandbags, an old tire, etc.) and will be going up and down a mountain, have to do lots of running in addition to all the military style physical training drills that is expected by The Guinness Book of World Record’s Most Fittest Man: Joe Decker. By morning time of 10/13/2012, in order to officially finish, I must complete a 1.5hrs bootcamp. This event is called The SUCK http://www.meetup.com/the-Suck/events/78394602/. Right after finishing The SUCK, I must travel 1+hrs away to go to a 5K obstacle race called the Rugged Maniac http://www.ruggedmaniac.com. As the title goes, I will “Endure For Charity” and do all this to raise money to bring a day of smiles for kids at the foster care.

 

HOW THE CHALLENGE WORKS:

*IF I FINISH THE TWO EVENTS…

…(hopefully uninjured and still alive) all the donated monies will help allow ALL the kids at the foster care for a day at the movies. I have also spoken to the director of The Herrick Center about creating and designing a thank you card with all the kids at the foster care. They will all sign this thank you card and you will get one upon completion of the two events. This will be our thank you to you for taking me on with this challenge and also for your donations that goes to a great and meaningful cause.

*IF I DO NOT FINISH THE TWO EVENTS…

…I hope we can still raise the $1,070 needed. But here are the kickers:

1) Same as above, all monies will go to the foster care kids for a day at the movies and you get a thank you card designed and signed by The Herrick Center Kids.

2) On top of that, I will donate $100 each to the same two local charities that work with kids in San Diego: They Say It's Your Birthday (TSIYB) and Project LOL (Love Out Loud; works with at-risk youth in downtown San Diego.)

3) AND…there’s “The CRAZY CONSEQUENCE Perk!!!” All people who donated will be able to submit an "embarrassing consequence" that I would have to do, that must be documented, and shared with all of you. From all your consequence submissions, I will select the Top 5 that I would do and from there, all of you will get to vote which is the one I will have to do. (FYI: In my first challenge in June 2012, I lost! So I had to dress in all Hello Kitty + all pink makeup and hair and then go workout wearing this Pinktacular Outfit during 2 consecutive bootcamp classes out in public where everyone can see.)

*YOU CAN ADD YOUR EMBARASSING COMMENT ON THE COMMENTS BOX WHEN YOU DONATE

 

Bryan Calo's Track Record for Charity:

For my first challenge, which was running my first marathon, the self-imposed challenge along with the people that donated were able to raise a total of $1,300 that was split to go to two local kids charities (mentioned above) here in San Diego. The reason I choose smaller and local charities is because I want to know exactly where the donated funds go. Unlike big fundraiser charities, I can tell all the people that donated where their money exactly went and what it funded. I just feel it’s good to know what your money exactly does in order to make a difference.

 

The Bottomline of Endure for Charity:

As a current volunteer with They Say It’s Your Birthday, the foundation that throws birthday parties for the kids in The Herrick Center Foster Care, I've realized that I was very fortunate for how I've grown up as a child. Sure, it wasn’t perfect, but I was able to grow up in a home with two parents who are still together to this very day. When I do volunteer work at TSIYB, I can only imagine what the kids have gone through. I see that the birthday parties and the time we spent with them really brings joy to them. I believe they need more joy, more smiles, more happy memorable moments in their lives. With this challenge and for us to pool a collective effort, this is our opportunity to make something good happen. I will Endure For Chairy in order to make this day come true for the kids. So join me in this challenge, for I know if we work together, we can all make a big difference.

 

 “Together we can do better.”

 

Sincerely,

Bryan Calo

 

Campaign Image Credit:

Person carrying the tire is Guinness Book of World Records World's Most Fittest Man Joe Decker, also the owner of Gut Check Fitness and the organizer of the endurance challenge called The Suck (Photo by Brad Roberts)

story:
.......................................................................................................................

LETTING GO

Several months ago I was informed that my trademark for Greenbody Greenplanet had never been secured. I was advised to change the name of my company and my product line to avoid legal disputes down the road.

I was completely devastated. I had just closed my salon to focus on this company full time, spent the last 3 years of my life + my entire retirement portfolio building it from the ground up, and now I was at risk of losing it all.

At first I blamed this difficulty on so many outlying factors —including poor legal counsel and misinformation.  But then I realized that it's my company, my responsibility and focusing on how it happened, wasn't going to change the fact that it did happen.

I could choose to look at this as a defeat and pick up my crayons and go home — or — I could put on my big girl pants and look at this as an opportunity to rebrand, refocus, expand and move on.

Since I've never been one to throw in the towel, I chose the latter:)

 

 

THE PAST

I started Greenbody Greenplanet during my husbands second battle with cancer when I became aware of the many chemicals that were in the personal care products we use daily, and how they may be affecting our health. (You can read the entire story here). I was a salon owner at the time and decided to flow my new line through my business, to make things simple during that very challenging time.
 
As time progressed, Greenbody Greenplanet grew in popularity and along with it my passion for bringing healthier products to the masses grew as well. On March 31st, 2012, after 14 years in business I decided to close the doors to my salon and focus on my new company full time.

 

  

 

FAST FORWARD TO THE PRESENT DAY

In order to bring things to the next level and really be taken seriously in the beauty industry, I need to expand my line and offer more product choices such as styling aids and serums. This was my original plan for 2013.

I've been turned down by many salons and distributors simply because my line is too small! The beauty industry is screaming for clean products that work but they also want "complete" lines to offer their clients.

As a stylist, it's difficult to recommend a hair gel full of chemicals to your client after you've just spent 20 minutes explaining the benefits of using an organic, toxin free shampoo!

And as a consumer? You wouldn't trust your stylist anymore!

My plans for expansion in 2013 are to bring in the following items, with a few already in the testing stages:

  • An alcohol free hair gel (first of it's kind)
  • A dry shampoo w/SPF (first of it's kind)
  • A smoothing serum (made without silicones)
  • A detangling creme
  • A hair-health treatment serum/deep conditioner

Every product we introduce will follow our mission and purpose, be made with certified organic ingredients, absolutely no chemicals, beautiful packaging and perform at the highest level. FAQ's.

 

 

 

 

MOVING FORWARD + GIVING BACK 

The great news is that we already are a company with a strong solid foundation and a Dream Team of advisors. We just need funding to re-brand and expand! Here's where I'm at....

  • I have recently hired a design company in Minneapolis, Imagehaus, that specializes in rebranding (MadeSmart, Sonia Kashuk, OfficeMax...) and we are currently working on my Brand DNA
  • I've hired a new business attorney, Swanson Law, to secure my new trademark
  • Started working with the accounting firm (Laurie Besikof Lapidus and Co) to guide our growth
  • I will be hiring tena.cious to take over my social media marketing and re-branding this summer along with creating buzz for the product launch
  • I am working with Erin Giles, to help me creatively build philanthropy into my new business model (see Charity: water below)
  • I will be featuring "ingredient spotlight" and other informative 2 minute videos every month with a focus on helping others understand product ingredients, how to read and understand labels and how to make wise choices.
  • My WiseGirl blog will be featuring a new series called  'Cancer: A Journey From the Other Side'. With millions of people affected by cancer I believe the spouse has their own incredible stories to tell. I will be sharing my experiences of how life changing Cancer was for me and what I've learned from it —including healthy ways to live a more toxin-free life.
  • I have a monthly newsletter that will help keep my current customers informed on the company changes + product expansion, and some of our customers are getting ready to test our new formulas!

 

I am also very excited to be donating a portion of our company profits from the sale of our Dry Shampoo to Charity : Water, a non-profit who's mission is to bring clean and safe drinking water to every person in the world.

CHARITY WATER:

 

 

WHO I AM.

For 14 years, I was the salon owner and manager of a 10 station hair salon. I also own a seasonal business at the MN State Fair called Fair Do's ,where I won The first People's Choice Award for Best Customer Experience in 2012. I used the lessons and experiences of those businesses as a base for building the strong, solid foundation of my current company.

My experience as a stylist has given me an inside edge in regards to consumers hair care wants, needs + concerns and I feel that I can help them achieve their goals by creating healthy products that benefit them while doing no harm.

My personal journey as the spouse of a wonderful man who has survived 3+ years of chemotherapy, a death diagnosis, spinal meningitis, congestive heart failure and COPD — all because of cancer — has taught me that I need to share my experiences with others and help them to know there are beautiful things that transpire.

I believe that everybody should have the ability to make informed choices and I don't believe that hair-stylists should have a 30% higher chance of Cancer than the general population.

 

 

WHERE THE MONEY WILL GO —THE RISKS AND CHALLENGES!

My plans this year were to expand the line, but now that I am forced to change the company name, I have to also re-brand. This campaign supports the financial costs of doing both.

Your support in this project is also helping so many other people who need the resources, tools, education and products to live healthy toxin-free lives!

Many of my customers are cancer survivors, have physical challenges or life changing diseases that have caused them to search out ways to lessen their toxic body burden, and if you watched the video you know there are so many more that need healthier options!

 

There is very little risk!

The company is already up and running and creating income. Customers are loving our hair care and begging for more toxin-free products!

Our Challenges?

Time and capital. My plans are already set in motion and if I hit my funding goal, things will manifest this November with a soft launch of our 5 new products, and then full launch with new website is scheduled for January 1st, 2014.

If I fall short of my target, I am still continuing on with my project, however the progress will be much slower.

 

 

HOW WE'LL UPDATE YOU!

Since I already have the ball rolling on my end, we'll be updating on our progress right after launch!

You'll be the first to know of our new company name, product name and have a sneek peek at the new design!

 

THANK YOU VERY MUCH!

Whether you contribute to our campaign or not, we appreciate you taking a moment to share it to your social media profiles, or pass it on to someone you know that is passionate about living toxin-free!

And don't forget to leave us a comment!!

 **PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU MAY ALSO CONTRIBUTE ANONYMOUSLY**

THE PAST
I started Greenbody Greenplanet during my husbands second battle with cancer when I became aware of the many chemicals that were in the personal care products we use daily, and how they may be affecting our health. (You can read the entire story here). I was a salon owner at the time and decided to flow my new line through my business, to make things simple during that very challenging time. As time progressed, Greenbody Greenplanet grew in popularity and along with it my passion for bringing healthier products to the masses grew as well. On March 31st, 2012, after 14 years in business I decided to close the doors to my salon and focus on my new company full time.
 

   
 
FAST FORWARD TO THE PRESENT DAY
In order to bring things to the next level and really be taken seriously in the beauty industry, I need to expand my line and offer more product choices such as styling aids and serums. This was my original plan for 2013.
I've been turned down by many salons and distributors simply because my line is too small! The beauty industry is screaming for clean products that work but they also want "complete" lines to offer their clients.
As a stylist, it's difficult to recommend a hair gel full of chemicals to your client after you've just spent 20 minutes explaining the benefits of using an organic, toxin free shampoo!
And as a consumer? You wouldn't trust your stylist anymore!
My plans for expansion in 2013 are to bring in the following items, with a few already in the testing stages:

An alcohol free hair gel (first of it's kind)
A dry shampoo w/SPF (first of it's kind)
A smoothing serum (made without silicones)
A detangling creme
A hair-health treatment serum/deep conditioner
Every product we introduce will follow our mission and purpose, be made with certified organic ingredients, absolutely no chemicals, beautiful packaging and perform at the highest level. FAQ's.
 
 
 
 
MOVING FORWARD + GIVING BACK 
The great news is that we already are a company with a strong solid foundation and a Dream Team of advisors. We just need funding to re-brand and expand! Here's where I'm at....

I have recently hired a design company in Minneapolis, Imagehaus, that specializes in rebranding (MadeSmart, Sonia Kashuk, OfficeMax...) and we are currently working on my Brand DNA
I've hired a new business attorney, Swanson Law, to secure my new trademark
Started working with the accounting firm (Laurie Besikof Lapidus and Co) to guide our growth
I will be hiring tena.cious to take over my social media marketing and re-branding this summer along with creating buzz for the product launch
I am working with Erin Giles, to help me creatively build philanthropy into my new business model (see Charity: water below)
I will be featuring "ingredient spotlight" and other informative 2 minute videos every month with a focus on helping others understand product ingredients, how to read and understand labels and how to make wise choices.
My WiseGirl blog will be featuring a new series called  'Cancer: A Journey From the Other Side'. With millions of people affected by cancer I believe the spouse has their own incredible stories to tell. I will be sharing my experiences of how life changing Cancer was for me and what I've learned from it —including healthy ways to live a more toxin-free life.
I have a monthly newsletter that will help keep my current customers informed on the company changes + product expansion, and some of our customers are getting ready to test our new formulas!
 
I am also very excited to be donating a portion of our company profits from the sale of our Dry Shampoo to Charity : Water, a non-profit who's mission is to bring clean and safe drinking water to every person in the world.
CHARITY WATER:

 
 
WHO I AM.
For 14 years, I was the salon owner and manager of a 10 station hair salon. I also own a seasonal business at the MN State Fair called Fair Do's ,where I won The first People's Choice Award for Best Customer Experience in 2012. I used the lessons and experiences of those businesses as a base for building the strong, solid foundation of my current company.
My experience as a stylist has given me an inside edge in regards to consumers hair care wants, needs + concerns and I feel that I can help them achieve their goals by creating healthy products that benefit them while doing no harm.

My personal journey as the spouse of a wonderful man who has survived 3+ years of chemotherapy, a death diagnosis, spinal meningitis, congestive heart failure and COPD — all because of cancer — has taught me that I need to share my experiences with others and help them to know there are beautiful things that transpire.
I believe that everybody should have the ability to make informed choices and I don't believe that hair-stylists should have a 30% higher chance of Cancer than the general population.
 
 
WHERE THE MONEY WILL GO —THE RISKS AND CHALLENGES!
My plans this year were to expand the line, but now that I am forced to change the company name, I have to also re-brand. This campaign supports the financial costs of doing both.
Your support in this project is also helping so many other people who need the resources, tools, education and products to live healthy toxin-free lives!
Many of my customers are cancer survivors, have physical challenges or life changing diseases that have caused them to search out ways to lessen their toxic body burden, and if you watched the video you know there are so many more that need healthier options!

 
There is very little risk!
The company is already up and running and creating income. Customers are loving our hair care and begging for more toxin-free products!
Our Challenges? 
Time and capital. My plans are already set in motion and if I hit my funding goal, things will manifest this November with a soft launch of our 5 new products, and then full launch with new website is scheduled for January 1st, 2014.
If I fall short of my target, I am still continuing on with my project, however the progress will be much slower.
 
 
HOW WE'LL UPDATE YOU!
Since I already have the ball rolling on my end, we'll be updating on our progress right after launch!
You'll be the first to know of our new company name, product name and have a sneek peek at the new design!
 
THANK YOU VERY MUCH!
Whether you contribute to our campaign or not, we appreciate you taking a moment to share it to your social media profiles, or pass it on to someone you know that is passionate about living toxin-free!
And don't forget to leave us a comment!!
 **PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU MAY ALSO CONTRIBUTE ANONYMOUSLY**

story:
Our Story

There are over 800,000 children reported missing every year. That is over 2,000 children every day. With over 2,000,000 women begin assaulted every year, more has to be done. We can do more to prevent this and the Protect Me Now Safety Alarm Bracelet is the answer. We have done countless hours of research, reaching out to consumers and asking questions and the positive response has been overwhelming. I am working with a dear friend in Los Angeles names Everett. He is very passionate and creative. After a lot of time and research we came up with a design that will appeal to everyone. We don't have a prototype yet due to funds. Having a mold specially made for our Bracelet is a bit expensive. We are in the process of having the alarm built and will function to our exact specifictions. The manufacturer has the sound recording of the scream and are working on the inner components and making the first alarm.


The Impact

We are creating a safer environment for women and children everywhere. This use of this bracelet will reduce the number of women assaulted and children abducted. Our goal is to make it affordable for every woman and/or parent regardless of income. Protection from assailants, bullies, attempted date rape, child predators, and many other dangerous situations.


What We Need & What You Get

We are working with a  manufacturer to build a 120 decibel push button alarm which will be placed into a bracelet. There are a lot of personal safety devices but there needs to be something that is easily accesible. The alarm will have a 2 second delay to prevent accidental set off. Once the alarm is pressed it will remain on for 2 minutes before it can be shut off. We do not want the assailant to be able to disarm the device. If the alarm is not turned off it will emit the 120 db scream for 10 minutes before automatically shutting off. Again we did a lot of research and found that the best sound for the alarm would be a woman screaming. The siren sound on most alarms may be dismissed as a car alarm, but when a woman screams, everyone looks. We have the manufacturer of the bracelet set up and ready to go. The bracelet will be made of silicone rubber. and it will have an alarm that is approximately 1" long by 1" wide and 1/2" thick. The company manufacturing the bracelet has designed a special mold that will fit tightly around the alarm much like a watch. The bracelet will have an adjustable rubber wrist strap. We are in the engineering process. The mold is in the process of being made, and they are installing the sound chip for the scream. The bracelet will cost 25.00. Our goal is to have them available for sale online this summer. We plan to have them in stores before the end of fall 2012.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please use the links provided to share our project and get the word out for this great idea.

Please understand that the bracelets cannot be shipped until the manufacturing is completed.

story:
The Tania Center

The Tania Integrated Rehabilitation Center seeks to provide marginalized Kenyan children with education, and equip them with skills to become contributing members of society. Situated in Kiserian, Kenya, about 35 kilometers from Nairobi, the Tania Centre is a full scale facility complete with a school, dormitories, and a playground. However, due to ever-lengthening droughts, the center struggles to irrigate the farmlands using traditional means. This forces the center to rely on donations to provide for the children during the dry season. Some girls in the Center have been victim to child marriage or Female Genital Cutting (FGC), while others face unequal treatment outside of the center. 

A Holistic Solution

Rural Enhancement through Education and Design and The Feminine Alliance, have partnered together to implement a holistic solution for the Tania Center. We will install a Drip Irrigation System which will provide the students with an efficient means of irrigating their farms even during the dry season. Requiring only small amounts of water, the drip irrigation system will make the center truly self-sustaining and provide the children with increased food security. This system will be installed with the help of the children, and will also act as a means of rehabilitation. The Feminine Alliance will send regular shipments of material aid including sanitary pads, multivitamins, and iron supplements. These material aid shipments will be coupled with empowerment programs on topics like nutrition, health, entrepreneurship, and gender equality. If girls in the Tania Center wish to pursue higher level education, The Feminine Alliance will work to sponsor her financially while also providing moral support.  

The Impact

This project will provide 165 marginalized children in Kenya with increased food security and female empowerment. To make this project a reality, we need your help. Please make a contribution to this project, and a difference in the lives of the children at the Tania Center in Kenya.

story:
The Dreamer:

 

My name is James Dortch; it has been a dream of mine for some time to have my own business. I have 17 years of experience in the hair care profession, the last 4 years I have been working from home using my garage to service my clientele. I believe now is the time to share my vision of a multicultural, unisex salon/barbershop. So in February of this year (2012) I found a building and, for the better part of 6 months I've been having renovations done to the interior, while also paying rent, which is 1600 per month. With a little help from you, banded together we can make this dream a reality. I am counting on your willingness to help, along with your generosity, to help launch a dream. 

 

 

 What this campaign is about:

I have purchased 3 barber chairs and 3 beauty chairs, in order to be fully staffed on opening day I need to buy a few more things the list of things i need is listed below:

Wall mount dryers…………..       4 @ 600 each=2400

Shampoo unit…………...            3 @ 600 each=1800

Styling chairs…………...            2 @ 229 each= 458

Barber chairs…………...             2 @ 529 each= 1058

Mirrors…………...                   10 @ 100 each= 1000

Barber stations…………...          5 @ 120 each= 600

Stylist stations……………           5 @ 120 each=600

Anti-fatigue mats…………...     10 @ 139 each= 1390

Barber station lights……………    5 @ 90 each= 450

Stylist lights……………              4 @ 35 each= 140

                                       1 @ 120 each= 120

Laminate floors…………… 700 sq ft @ 2.50 each=1750

The total for these items before taxes is 11,766

The extra 821.75 are fees for both paypal and Indiegogo

 

 

 

 

I don't have any unique perks as others, however when you help with this project I will mention you on my website(once it's complete)as someone who helped launch a dream and contributed to the success of The Razors Edge. Absolutely 100% of all funds collected will be used to purchase equipment. I will also keep everyone who gives informed with the progress, purchases, and also my opening date. No matter which amount you choose, I am forever grateful for whatever you can to do to help.

 





The Impact

To be honest I am not bringing an end to world hunger, however what we can do together is make a dream a reality. A fully funded campaign will buy all the necessities to have a great opening day and successful salon. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

You may not be able to contribute as much as you'd like at this time, but like I've said every little bit helps. However if you can't give anything please pass the word on through twitter, face book, or any form of social media you'd like, including word of mouth.  

                          THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR GENEROSITY!!!!!!!

story:
Youth-Led, Solutions-Oriented

 

Growing Food and Sustainability emerged out of two sisters’ wish to give back to the community in which they grew up. Our organization focuses on experiential education for youth in the Middleton and Madison area through projects such as gardening at a youth farm, cooking, composting, and biking--all with the aim of exploring sustainable and community-minded living practices. We believe in the power of young people and work with them to forge what we hope will be a more thoughtful and exploratory world for all.

 

Growing Food and Sustainability gives community members the opportunity to learn about and experience sustainable agriculture, empowers young people to make positive change in their world, and provides access to fresh fruits and vegetables to those in need.  Through our summer garden camp, after school program, and involvement with the high school Ecology Clubs, our organization gives Middleton community members of all ages the opportunity to engage in environmental education and food production.   As a space where multiple age groups interact, teach, and learn together, the garden creates a greater sense of community in Middleton while encouraging youth to continually rise to the next level of responsibility and leadership.  By incorporating the gardens into class projects, we provide Middleton students with new opportunities to learn academic material in an interactive, project-based environment.

 

In our first year, we made large strides towards making Middleton more sustainable, and we also empowered young people to make healthier choices and take a more active role in the shaping of their community.  We can’t wait to accomplish even more this year, with your help!

 

 

Training a New Generation of Youth Leaders

 

One of Growing Food and Sustainability’s core goals is to train and inspire a new generation of youth leaders to create their own solutions to the world’s challenges.  Our Indiegogo campaign is focused on raising money for stipends so that we can train youth through our summer internship program.  Last summer, two local college students participated in our internship.  This summer, we plan to select five interns to participate in this leadership development experience.  Interns learn through peer-lead trainings as well as by taking an active, hands-on role in our organization. They learn how to plan curriculum for the summer garden camp, serve as camp counselors, workshop leaders, and meeting facilitators, coordinate community workdays, harvest days, the weekly compost pick-up, and the weekly produce delivery, and will learn green entrepreneurship skills by helping to run our farmers’ market stand.   Our goal is to make sure that every graduate of our internship program leaves with the skills and knowledge to start an initiative of their own.

 

Though our experience has proven that young people of all ages do care about current social and environmental issues, we realize that summer jobs must often take precedence over unpaid programs. By providing stipends to interns, we will make sure that these opportunities for enrichment and growth are available to all.  Through our model of peer-to-peer training and collaboration, we believe that summer interns will develop leadership and organizational skills that will prepare them for the future as much or more as any summer job.

Growing Food and Sustainability, with your help, will deepen our roots in Middleton and provide young people with the opportunity to grow and thrive as leaders within their communities. We believe in the great accomplishments that can be had by planting seeds of change; through the strength of our youth, we plan to do just that--one garden at a time.

Thank you!!

 

How Your Contribution Will Change the World!


Your contribution will make a direct impact in our sustainability leadership training program by allowing us to pay the stipends of 3 of our summer interns!  Would you like to hear the personal stories of two of the interns we have selected so far?  Read our blog post featuring Katie and Morgan, two lovely ladies who volunteered with Growing Food and Sustainability last year and decided to take the dive into a summer internship this year!

If you are unable to make a donation but live in the area, please join us for a community workday or an upcoming event! 

Email GrowingFoodandSustainability@gmail.com to sign-up for our email list

Follow our Blog: Growing Food and Sustainability

Like our Facebook page: Growing Food and Sustainability

Follow us on Twitter: @GFSMiddleton

story:
What this is all about

Hi everyone. My mom was assaulted last Monday and she lost all the money that it was supposed to be for paying her employees, she lost 42 500 pesos [3320 dollars], and when her boss knew what happend to her, she didn't help her and instead she told her that if she didn't pay the money to her employees by November 10th, she's going to sue her. [She's practically trying to send my mom to jail if she doesn't pay]

The problem is that we don't have that money, my parents have a lot of things to pay every single month, and they just payed my last brother's operation [They gave him a new valve].

I can't do much for them because I'm practically still a kid, but the only thing that maybe I can do is try to help them, so please, help me. 

What We Need & What You Get:

  • My mom needs the money before the 10th of November
  • I really don't have much to offer, but I'll try to find something to you guys.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • If you got here because of Tumblr just reblog the post.
  • You can also share this page.


The picture above is the denounce my mom did last Monday.
Thank you for your time.

story:
On a local free site, I recently noticed a woman wanting to give away warm clothes in trade for food. She has a teenaged son, and after paying bills every month has less than $100 for necessities like food, not to mention luxuries like Internet and cable. I think it is devastating that someone would have to trade necessities like this, and I would like to put together enough food for her that she wouldn't have to give away her mittens, scarves and toques.

My aim is to put together a grocery delivery so that at least that issue is taken care of for this family. Christmas is coming and I think being able to make a difference for Melanie and her son would be a tremendous, generous gift.
