story:
.           
A quick note about navigation. The campaign runs in a sequential format but feel free to jump to any of the following links:               

  
| Four Simple Rules | Four Easy Steps | Why be Proactive? | Model Portfolios | Performance | Test Drive IP | Why is IP Different? | Website Tour | Bag of Articles | What Do You Get? | Perks | What We Need? | Risks/Timeline | Our Team | Q&A |            
     
                         ___________________________________________________



Our Step by Step Approach


We started Investors Prophet to show people that there is an uncomplicated, safe and complete way to invest. That's the IP Way.

By complete we mean a service that doesn’t just promote a bunch of buy recommendations only to leave you questioning which stocks to buy, how many shares to purchase or most importantly when to sell them.

As you’re about to read, we lead you through every step of the stock selection and portfolio management process.

Investing made easy


The main premise of investing the IP Way is to cut losses and let profits run. We do this by identifying rising price trends early, timing the market and knowing when to jump in or jump ship. It's investing made easy.

This strategy is then overlaid with a robust set of risk and money management features. Furthermore, we don’t use leverage or debt, and only invest in ordinary fully paid common shares.

Our systematic approach towards investing identifies companies with share price action that suggests that the value of their shares could be about to start trending higher.

We need a rising share price to make money



Importantly, this same systematic approach also allows for all discretionary elements to be stripped from the entire investing process. It’s this approach that allows even the novice investor to invest the IP Way.

Step by step process

Before we get into the detail of our daily routine, it’s worth explaining where we get our investment ideas from and how our filtering process works.

Our stock selection process operates like a funnel.  At the top we have the largest 500 companies (by market cap) listed on the NASDAQ exchange and the 500 companies that make up the S&P 500 index. We call these two groups our 'investment universe' of companies.


                        



At the end of each day we scan our investment universe looking for Buy Alerts. Remember - these are companies with share prices that are showing signs that they could be in the early stages of a new uptrend.

We say 'could' as we never know until after the event

It's these Buy alerts that will eventually populate your portfolios. Each day we also check for any Sell alerts. These Buy and Sell alerts then get published as part of our daily Buy and Sell Alert Email which is sent out to all subscribers.

So that’s the stock selection part of the process at the strategy level. Now let's take a look at our four simple steps and show you just how easy it is to invest the IP Way.

______________________
                               
Four Simple Rules


Now that you've got an understanding how the mechanics of our strategy work, it's time to show you how easy it is to follow, and what's needed to invest the IP Way.

We’ve distilled the entire stock selection and portfolio management processes into four simply rules and steps. 

Once you’ve decided on the amount you want to invest, you then need to decide whether to follow our Nasdaq or S&P 500 strategy. Both strategies use the same methodology but have slightly different risk profiles (more on that later).

Once that’s done, you’re ready to hit the start button.

                          


Yes...they’re that simple, but to make sure you truly understand every aspect of each rule let’s discuss each one in detail:

Build a portfolio of 20 stocks

Deciding how many companies to have in your portfolio can be a tricky guessing. For us, though, the magic number is 20 with your capital split equally between each company. Here’s our reasoning:

Twenty companies means that you’re not over trading or relying too heavily on just one or two companies to bring home the bacon. You’ll also allow your larger individual profits to make a meaningful difference to the bottom line.

Don’t forget that a 100% trade profit in a 20 company portfolio makes a 5% difference to the bottom line.

Never add more than two stocks each day

The obvious reason here is that you don’t want to be burdened with having to fill all 20 places in your portfolio in just a couple of days. You're more likely to make unnecessary mistakes when under such pressure.

Also, you don’t want to be over-exposed to any nasty whipsaw actions at such an early stage of such a large number of trades.


Buy and Sell on the open of the next trading day

This rule keeps any discretion out of our investment strategy. We humans are a fickle bunch and invariably start tinkering with things if given half a chance.

The open of each trading day not only tends to be the highest volume part of the day but it also negates the idea of having to second guess when to actually buy or sell a stock.
                           
Only ever sell a stock when a Sell alert is generated

This is another one of our cornerstone rules which is based on the premise of cutting your losses early and letting your profits run. A large number of our losses are from trades where a share price showed initial indications that it was about to start an upward trend only to falter and head in the wrong direction.

So, once a company makes it into your portfolio you do nothing, except collect dividends, until a Sell alert is generated for it.           
                          ____________________________________________
                               

Four Easy Steps


Now that you have an understanding of our rules you'll have no trouble following our easy step by step process of creating and managing your portfolio.

We'll step you through this entire process in detail as part of our Taking Investors Prophet for a Test Drive article but it’s worth going over them here while the rules part of the process is still fresh in your mind.

              



Decide how much to invest: Several issues come into play when deciding how much of your hard earned capital to invest. You definitely shouldn’t invest any funds that you can’t afford to lose or funds that you think you’ll need to access any time soon. We’re talking the next few years here to give your investments long enough to really work their magic.

Picking which strategy to follow: A lot of people naturally go for our better performing Nasdaq strategy but there are a few things you need to consider:

  • The Nasdaq strategy does come with more volatility than the S&P strategy (losses and price swings tend to be slightly larger)
  • You don’t get the same broad representation of the economy
  • Dividend income is lower which is a consideration for retirees 

Start populating your portfolio with stocks: Remember that you only ever buy a stock on the open of the day after a Buy alert has been generating and you only ever buy a maximum of two stocks a day. The value of each purchase equates to one twentieth of your capital.

Once you have 20 stocks you then go into our Buy/Sell rotating mode: This is when you simply sit back and collect any dividends while watching your profits grow. Remember that you only ever sell a stock when a Sell alert is generated, and yes you got it – you sell it on the open of the next day’s trading.  

                     



You get the picture

It’s as simple as that. Once you invest in a company you just sit back and collect any dividends until a Sell alert is generated for that company. When that happens you then follow our rotating Buy/Sell process for as long as you want to continue investing the IP Way. We cover this in detail in our Take Investors Prophet for a Test Drive article.
                          ____________________________________________
Top of Campaign                                   

 

Why be Proactive?


By being proactive we mean that you need to be able to side step the big down drafts and then, during the good times, be able to fill your portfolio with stocks that are on the move.

What really drives share prices up and down? There’s no doubt that positive and negative fundamentals drive share prices higher and lower, but it is positive and negative sentiment that causes the value of companies to move above and below their intrinsic values.

Just look at what happened in 2007 and 2008. It was positive sentiment that overbalanced share prices to the high side in 2007, before negative sentiment overbalanced prices to the downside in 2008 and early 2009.

It's all in the chart


Let’s have a look at a couple of charts to help you visualise what I’m saying. The chart below is a monthly chart of the S&P 500 – one of the benchmark indexes for the North American stock market.


It clearly shows the direction of the broader market over several years. It starts with the helicon years of the Tech boom from 1996–2000 (Green), which then morphed into the Tech crash-induced bear market from 2000-2003 (Red).

During much of that downdraft Investors Prophet would have kept your powder dry – your cash locked up in a bank account earning interest. Then it would’ve been all systems go again during the 2003-2007 (Green) bull market.

It then shows the 2008 (Red) bear market where investing the IP way would have once again kept you out of trouble – thereby preserving your hard earned cash.

That GFC induced bear market then gave way to rising share prices during the early part of 2009 (Green), at which point our strategy again started identifying new names to be added to our Active Teams, and ultimately our portfolios (we’ll explain this process a bit later).

Avoiding downdrafts

For most investors it’s what was, or wasn’t, done during those big downdrafts of 2000–2003 and 2008 that is the main differential when considering where the value of your portfolio stands now.

The second chart (below) shows how, when the conditions of the broader market are right, Investors Prophet identifies companies that are about to embark on an uptrend – that is prices are starting to rise.


Buy alerts are only generated when a share price is deemed to be at the start of a rising trend (the lower eclipse - shaded green). Companies then remain in your portfolio until it’s deemed likely that the trend has ended at which time a Sell alert is generated (the upper eclipse - shaded red).

It's not an exact science and as with all strategies, there will be false starts. That's why we take the risk side of the equation so seriously and know our exit strategy before we ever enter a trade.
                             _______________________________________________
Top of Campaign     
                                      

Why is IP Different?

Before digging a little deeper to see how you'll start and manage your portfolio, let's first take another look at some of the key benefits of investing the IP Way.



It’s important to remember that an average return is just that. Profits never go up in a straight line unless you happen to be Bernard Maldoff!

It is also important that the way in which profits are generated doesn’t come with unrealistic levels of risk or effort. You'll often see performance figures that look great, but what isn’t mentioned are the large losses in between the odd huge profit.

                                         _____________________________________


                                           
We don't use any leverage or debt: People forget that debt and leverage can be a double edged sword. It’s great to have a multiplier effect on your profits when things are going well, but that same multiplier effect will hound your bottom line when the going gets tough and losses start to appear. Make no mistake that will happen.

Keeps you sidelined during volatile times: This is key to growing your profits over the long term. You just need to think back to 2000-2003 and 2008 to understand this. Some may say those downdrafts were a long time ago but trust me it's a matter of when rather than if we'll see one again.

                                    ________________________________________



You follow 4 simple rules in 4 easy steps: Such a simple process means that even novice investors to be clearly stepped through every part of the stock selection and portfolio management processes.
 
We tell you exactly what to do and when to do it: This one’s self explanatory. As long as you follow our prompts and make sure that you keep checking in on a daily basis, either via our daily alert emails or on the website, you’ll be right.

                           ______________________________________________

Takes 5 mins a Day




You probably don’t realise how important the above graphic is. There should be a third line that goes something like this:

= 5 mins a day

For most of us it’s just no use trying to fit several hours of analysis into our already busy schedule. That’s before considering that you actually know what you’re doing.
                          _____________________________________________
Top of Campaign                                   


Model Portfolios


There are two main reasons for running our model portfolios. To show you just how user-friendly, and how profitable, it can be to invest the IP Way.

It’s important to note that our portfolios are only hypothetical and that no consideration has been made for the payment of tax or transactions costs. That said neither do we include dividend or interest income in our results.

Our S&P 500 and Nasdaq portfolios are identical from a strategy and investment processes point of view. The primary difference is the universe of stocks each strategy pulls its constituents from.

We don't have enough space here to provide a detailed review of our portfolios but the following turquoise coloured link takes you our latest portfolio update that gives you a snap shot of what's been happening. Don't worry, there'll be plenty of links to direct you back to our campaign.

Latest Portfolio Update

We won’t talk about performance issues here, as we’ll cover them a bit further down. Also, you may ask why we only update our portfolios once a month.

It was never our intention for you to follow our every move per-say, as our portfolios are mainly designed to provide a snap shot of what an IP portfolio looks like and what the issues are that need to be dealt with from month to month!  
                          _______________________________________________


Our Performance


It's easy to come up with a set of figures that look impressive on paper, so we've taken time to provide a detailed account of our performance and some of the key numbers and ratios to consider.

One of the key aspects of any investment plan is to focus on managing risk and to be happy to watch from the sidelines during times of uncertainty. That’s exactly what Investors Prophet does, forcing you to sit on the sidelines for much of 2008, and for several months during 2010 and 2011.

This ability to know when to sit tight cannot be over stated and is one of the key components of the differential between our results and those made by many others. Managing risk is pivotal to longevity in this game.

The numbers


The following table emphasises the point well by clearly showing just how much difference our more proactive approach can make to the value of a portfolio. It compares the results of our Nasdaq portfolio to that of the NASDAQ-100 index from January 2008 to December 2014.

 
Since January 2008, just before the GFC started, we've turned $100,000 into $485,000. Many commentators, however, use January 2009 as the start date for their performance figures, which happens to be at the end of the GFC and after share prices had just fallen by 40%.

Our Performance Page

For the purposes of our Indiegogo campaign, and due to space constraints, the above numbers are only for our Nasdaq strategy.  Now make sure you go to the performance page of our website (the above turquoise coloured link) to get a much more detailed insight into some of the key aspects of the results. I think you’ll be impressed. Don't worry, there'll be plenty of links to direct you back to our campaign.
                           ______________________________________________
Top of Campaign                                 
 

Test Drive Investors Prophet


There's nothing like taking a car for a test drive. You jump behind the wheel excited with anticipation, while wondering what you'll be thinking when you next pull into the curb.

We hope this test drive will be no different and that you’ll walk away satisfied. We won’t be jumping in a car but we’ll be assuming we started the New Year of 2014 with $50,000 of cash wanting to find a home in your portfolio.

We’ll be starting off with an introduction about our approach towards investing and then do some revision about some of the key aspects of our S&P 500 strategy. Then we’ll be off for the test drive before having a look at the results.

Test Drive Investors Prophet

You'll need to head over to the website to finish the test drive as it takes up way too much space, but believe me it's worth the read. So click on the above turquoise coloured link and jump in for a test drive.
                             ______________________________________________
                  

Our Bag of Articles


When deciding to invest you need to make sure you're armed with the right information and that you understand every aspect of your strategy.

We are sure the following articles will go a long way to doing just this, so click on whichever image takes your fancy and you'll be directed to that page on our site.

Don't worry, though, we've made sure you'll be able to easily find your way back here. So take the plunge and we'll see you on the other side.

Click on any of the following images to read an article


  

  

   


We're sure you found some food for thought amongst that lot. Now let's take time to go on a tour of the website.

                      ___________Contribute___________

Top of Campaign                              

       


Website Tour


If you've got this far you should now have a good idea of how investing the IP Way works and how it can help you to become a profitable investor.

So, if you haven’t already, it’s probably time for us to take you on a walk around our website. Here we’ll explain some of the key aspects of our service and show you how to make the best use of what we’ve got on offer.

Please remember about two of the key reasons for campaigning on Indiegogo:

  • We need you to give us your wish list. What changes would you make and how you’d like the service look and operate. You'll get your chance via a survey shortly after the end of the campaign.
  • We need to raise funds to implement the plans we have and any of your ideas that we can accommodate.

We’ll be making changes anyway, but this is your big chance to have your say about what you really think is important. So help us make it happen.



You should now have a good idea about the site's structure and navigation. Let's take some time to look at what you'll get as a subscriber.

                          ___________Contribute___________

                              

What Do You Get?


You'll get the opportunity to subscribe to a truly unique service that will help you in your journey towards becoming a more profitable investor.

Carry on reading to see just how comprehensive our offer to you is. All perks will come with everything listed below with the only difference being the timeframe associated with each perk.

Access to the Entire Site


You’ll get access to the entire website which encompasses both strategies as well as all the educational material. It’s something that won’t be on offer again. Certainly not at the prices we’re offering on Indiegogo.

Don’t forget that you will gain full access to the site from the day you fund a perk but your subscription period will only start after our campaign finishes. So make sure you contribute early to get the full benefit of the extra FREE time.  

Introductory Email Series


We'll explain the logic behind our investment philosophy and strategy. You’ll receive a series of four introductory emails that will set you up for an exciting journey towards profitable investing.

By the end of the series you’ll have a complete understanding of how to invest the IP Way and you’ll know exactly what to do and when to do it.

Special Reports


Our Step by Step Guide to Profitable Investing: we look at some of the common traits of big time investors, the importance of knowing yourself and investing proactively before clearly stepping through each of the key aspects of being a profitable investor. It’s a must read to really understand the logic behind investing the IP Way.

The Four Ps of Investing: OK making a profit is one of them, which we’re talk about at length, but without a good understanding of the others you’re likely to only be a temporary resident of the investing community. I’ll leave you to guess what the others are and I can guarantee this special report will be an interesting read.

Daily Buy and Sell Email Alerts


Everything we do is centred on our Buy and Sell alerts. If you want to invest the IP Way then you need to keep abreast of our daily alerts. The best way to do that is to check our Daily Buy and Sell Alert emails.

We highlight the number of Buy and Sell alerts for each strategy and provide a link back to the website so you can view which companies have made the lists.

Classroom Articles


Even though we are happy to do all the strategy based work for you, it’s imperative that you continually strive to learn and to broaden your knowledge base. We’ll welcome you into the classroom and provide weekly articles that are designed to focus your attention on the issues that really count.

Portfolio Updates


Shortly after the end of each month we publish updates for each of our model portfolios. We start off by providing an overview of what sort of mood Mr Markets been in before digging a little deeper to see what’s really been happening. These updates provide a great insight into how to manage a portfolio the IP Way.

                                   ___________Contribute___________

Top of Campaign                                   


Perks

I'm sure that you'll agree that we have a lot to offer and just to cement that view remember that every perk receives the following benefits.

You'll receive

  • Complete Access to the site: including both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq strategies.
  • Two Special Reports (FREE):  'Our Step by Step Guide to Profitable Investing' and 'The Four Ps to Investing' are a must read to really understand the logic behind investing the IP Way.
  • Early Bird (FREE) Access Your subscription will only start when the campaign ends, but you'll have full access to the site from the day you fund your perk. So get in early as the extra time is ABSOLUTELY FREE.
  • Prices Won't Rise: We will honour the renewal, for up to 12 months, of all perks at the value at which the perk is originally purchased at.

Click on one of the images

                  

                  

                           
  .______________________________________________
Top of Campaign


What Do We Need?


This is where spell out our reasons for crowd funding on Indiegogo. Essentially we need to raise funds to upgrade our website and get to feedback from you.

The majority of the funds raised will be used to redesign the website and to make it mobile friendly. The changes will be centred on improving the functionality and speed of the service while also incorporating some of your ideas.

We’re not putting a figure on the cost of any changes as we don’t know exactly what those changes will be or which ones we can afford, until we’ve heard back from you.

We need feedback


We’ve done all the hard work associated with developing and back-testing our strategy. We know it works so we now need to focus on providing the service for people like you.

We want to listen to you. We’re keen to hear your suggestions about how to customise our service to best suit your needs. It’s not often that customers get to have a say about how they’d like a service to look and feel, but that’s exactly what we’re doing.

So make sure you send in a comment with any suggestions and be sure to complete a small survey we’ll be sending out shortly after the end of the campaign.
                                                  ___________Contribute___________


Risks/Timeline

Our campaign is slightly different to most others as Investors Prophet is already up and running which means you'll start receiving the full service from the day you fund a perk.


At this stage we can't provide definitive timeline for when we expect the changes to be completed as many of them will be based on the feedback we get from you.

The Special Reports will be available within one month of the campaign ending, while changes to the website will progressively be made over a six month period.

Access to website


The great thing about our campaign is that there is no waiting. You start to receive the full service from the day after you fund a perk. Even better is that your subscription period only starts from the end of the campaign. So the earlier you get started the more you get for FREE.

Risks


Investors Prophet is already up and running and the funds raised will primarily be used to improve the functionality and look and feel of the service. This, therefore, reduces most risks normally associated with designing and producing products that have yet to be completed.
___________Contribute___________

Top of Campaign

Our Team & Q&A

My name is Robert Carey and I'm the driving force behind Investors Prophet. I've been educating and guiding investors for over 25 years which has given me an innate understanding of what the most common pitfalls are and how to help people to become profitable investors.

Some Background

We've run out of space here so please follow the above turquoise coloured link to our website to read more about my background (including a mug shot) and that of our other team members.

Questions and Answers

You guessed it. We have to send you to our website (click on the above turquoise coloured  link) to check out our list of questions and answers.

Finally, I'd like to say a big THANK YOU for showing an interest in Investors Prophet. I hope you decide to take up one of Perks. Either way I wish you luck on your journey to profitable investing.

the NASDAQ exchange and the 500 companies that make up the S&P 500 
index. We call these two groups our 'investment universe' of companies.                         At the end of each day we scan our investment universe looking for Buy Alerts. Remember - these are companies with share prices that are showing signs that they could be in the early stages of a new uptrend. 
We say 'could' as we never know until after the event

It's these Buy alerts that will eventually populate your portfolios. Each day we also check for any Sell alerts. These Buy and Sell alerts then get published as part of our daily Buy and Sell Alert Email which is sent out to all subscribers.So that’s the stock selection part of the process at the strategy level. Now let's take a look at our four simple steps and show you just how easy it is to invest the IP Way.
______________________


                                


Four Simple Rules

Now that you've got an understanding how the mechanics of our strategy work, it's time to show you how easy it is to follow, and what's needed to invest the IP Way. 

We’ve distilled the entire stock selection and portfolio management processes into four simply rules and steps.  Once you’ve decided on the amount you want to invest, you then need to decide whether to follow our Nasdaq or S&P 500 strategy. Both strategies use the same methodology but have slightly different risk profiles (more on that later). Once that’s done, you’re ready to hit the start button.                            Yes...they’re that simple, but to make sure you truly understand every aspect of each rule let’s discuss each one in detail:
Build a portfolio of 20 stocks

Deciding how many companies to have in your portfolio can be a tricky guessing. For us, though, the magic number is 20 with your capital split equally between each company. Here’s our reasoning: Twenty companies means that you’re not over trading or relying too heavily on just one or two companies to bring home the bacon. You’ll also allow your larger individual profits to make a meaningful difference to the bottom line. Don’t forget that a 100% trade profit in a 20 company portfolio makes a 5% difference to the bottom line.
Never add more than two stocks each day

The obvious reason here is that you don’t want to be burdened with having to fill all 20 places in your portfolio in just a couple of days. You're more likely to make unnecessary mistakes when under such pressure. Also, you don’t want to be over-exposed to any nasty whipsaw actions at such an early stage of such a large number of trades. 
Buy and Sell on the open of the next trading day

This rule keeps any discretion out of our investment strategy. We humans are a fickle bunch and invariably start tinkering with things if given half a chance.The open of each trading day not only tends to be the highest volume part of the day but it also negates the idea of having to second guess when to actually buy or sell a stock.                             
Only ever sell a stock when a Sell alert is generated

This is another one of our cornerstone rules which is based on the premise of cutting your losses early and letting your profits run. A large number of our losses are from trades where a share price showed initial indications that it was about to start an upward trend only to falter and head in the wrong direction. So, once a company makes it into your portfolio you do nothing, except collect dividends, until a Sell alert is generated for it.                                      ____________________________________________                                
Four Easy Steps


Now that you have an understanding of our rules you'll have no trouble following our easy step by step process of creating and managing your portfolio. 
We'll step you through this entire process in detail as part of our Taking Investors Prophet for a Test Drive article but it’s worth going over them here while the rules part of the process is still fresh in your mind. 

               

Decide how much to invest: Several issues come into play when deciding how much of your hard earned capital to invest. You definitely shouldn’t invest any funds that you can’t afford to lose or funds that you think you’ll need to access any time soon. We’re talking the next few years here to give your investments long enough to really work their magic. Picking which strategy to follow: A lot of people naturally go for our better performing Nasdaq strategy but there are a few things you need to consider:
The Nasdaq strategy does come with more volatility than the S&P strategy (losses and price swings tend to be slightly larger)
You don’t get the same broad representation of the economy
Dividend income is lower which is a consideration for retirees  

Start populating your portfolio with stocks: Remember that you only ever buy a stock on the open of the day after a Buy alert has been generating and you only ever buy a maximum of two stocks a day. The value of each purchase equates to one twentieth of your capital. Once you have 20 stocks you then go into our Buy/Sell rotating mode: This is when you simply sit back and collect any dividends while watching your profits grow. Remember that you only ever sell a stock when a Sell alert is generated, and yes you got it – you sell it on the open of the next day’s trading.  

                      
You get the picture

It’s as simple as that. Once you invest 
in a company you just sit back and collect any dividends until a Sell 
alert is generated for that company. When that happens you then 
follow our rotating Buy/Sell process for as long as you want to 
continue investing the IP Way. We cover this in detail in our Take Investors Prophet for a Test Drive article.                          ____________________________________________Top of Campaign                                     
Why be Proactive?


By being proactive we mean that you need to be able to side step the big down drafts and then, during the good times, be able to fill your portfolio with stocks that are on the move. 
What really drives share prices up and down? There’s no doubt that positive and negative fundamentals drive share prices higher and lower, but it is positive and negative sentiment that causes the value of companies to move above and below their intrinsic values. Just look at what happened in 2007 and 2008. It was positive sentiment that overbalanced share prices to the high side in 2007, before negative sentiment overbalanced prices to the downside in 2008 and early 2009.

It's all in the chart

Let’s have a look at a couple of charts to help you visualise what I’m saying. The chart below is a monthly chart of the S&P 500 – one of the benchmark indexes for the North American stock market.

It clearly shows the direction of the broader market over several years. It starts with the helicon years of the Tech boom from 1996–2000 (Green), which then morphed into the Tech crash-induced bear market from 2000-2003 (Red). During much of that downdraft Investors Prophet would have kept your powder dry – your cash locked up in a bank account earning interest. Then it would’ve been all systems go again during the 2003-2007 (Green) bull market.It then shows the 2008 (Red) bear market where investing the IP way would have once again kept you out of trouble – thereby preserving your hard earned cash.That GFC induced bear market then gave way to rising share prices during the early part of 2009 (Green), at which point our strategy again started identifying new names to be added to our Active Teams, and ultimately our portfolios (we’ll explain this process a bit later).
Avoiding downdrafts

For most investors it’s what was, or wasn’t, done during those big downdrafts of 2000–2003 and 2008 that is the main differential when considering where the value of your portfolio stands now. The second chart (below) shows how, when the conditions of the broader market are right, Investors Prophet identifies companies that are about to embark on an uptrend – that is prices are starting to rise.

Buy alerts are only generated when a share price is deemed to be at the start of a rising trend (the lower eclipse - shaded green). Companies then remain in your portfolio until it’s deemed likely that the trend has ended at which time a Sell alert is generated (the upper eclipse - shaded red). It's not an exact science and as with all strategies, there will be false starts. That's why we take the risk side of the equation so seriously and know our exit strategy before we ever enter a trade.                              _______________________________________________Top of Campaign                                             
Why is IP Different?

Before digging a little deeper to see how you'll start and manage your portfolio, let's first take another look at some of the key benefits of investing the IP Way. 
It’s important to remember that an average return is just that. Profits never go up in a straight line unless you happen to be Bernard Maldoff!It is also important that the way in which profits are generated doesn’t come with unrealistic levels of risk or effort. You'll often see performance figures that look great, but what isn’t mentioned are the large losses in between the odd huge profit.                                          _____________________________________                                            We don't use any leverage or debt: People forget that debt and leverage can be a double edged sword. It’s great to have a multiplier effect on your profits when things are going well, but that same multiplier effect will hound your bottom line when the going gets tough and losses start to appear. Make no mistake that will happen. Keeps you sidelined during volatile times: This is key to growing your profits over the long term. You just need to think back to 2000-2003 and 2008 to understand this. Some may say those downdrafts were a long time ago but trust me it's a matter of when rather than if we'll see one again.                                    ________________________________________

You follow 4 simple rules in 4 easy steps: Such a simple process means that even novice investors to be clearly stepped through every part of the stock selection and portfolio management processes. We tell you exactly what to do and when to do it: This one’s self explanatory. As long as you follow our prompts and make sure that you keep checking in on a daily basis, either via our daily alert emails or on the website, you’ll be right.                           ______________________________________________

Takes 5 mins a Day

You probably don’t realise how important the above graphic is. There should be a third line that goes something like this:= 5 mins a dayFor most of us it’s just no use trying to fit several hours of analysis into our already busy schedule. That’s before considering that you actually know what you’re doing.                           _____________________________________________Top of Campaign                                    
Model Portfolios


There are two main reasons for running our model portfolios. To show you just how user-friendly, and how profitable, it can be to invest the IP Way. 

It’s important to note that our portfolios are only hypothetical and that no consideration has been made for the payment of tax or transactions costs. That said neither do we include dividend or interest income in our results. Our S&P 500 and Nasdaq portfolios are identical from a strategy and investment processes point of view. The primary difference is the universe of stocks each strategy pulls its constituents from. We don't have enough space here to provide a detailed review of our portfolios but the following turquoise coloured link takes you our latest portfolio update that gives you a snap shot of what's been happening. Don't worry, there'll be plenty of links to direct you back to our campaign.
Latest Portfolio Update
We won’t talk about performance issues here, as we’ll cover them a bit further down. Also, you may ask why we only update our portfolios once a month.It was never our intention for you to follow our every move per-say, as our portfolios are mainly designed to provide a snap shot of what an IP portfolio looks like and what the issues are that need to be dealt with from month to month!                            _______________________________________________
Our Performance


It's easy to come up with a set of figures that look impressive on paper, so we've taken time to provide a detailed account of our performance and some of the key numbers and ratios to consider. One of the key aspects of any investment plan is to focus on managing risk and to be happy to watch from the sidelines during times of uncertainty. That’s exactly what Investors Prophet does, forcing you to sit on the sidelines for much of 2008, and for several months during 2010 and 2011.This ability to know when to sit tight cannot be over stated and is one of the key components of the differential between our results and those made by many others. Managing risk is pivotal to longevity in this game. 

The numbers 

The following table emphasises the point well by clearly showing just how much difference our more proactive approach can make to the value of a portfolio. It compares the results of our Nasdaq portfolio to that of the NASDAQ-100 index from January 2008 to December 2014.


 Since January 2008, just before the GFC started, we've turned $100,000 into $485,000. Many commentators, however, use January 2009 as the start date for their performance figures, which happens to be at the end of the GFC and after share prices had just fallen by 40%. 
Our Performance Page
For the purposes of our Indiegogo campaign, and due to space constraints, the above numbers are only for our Nasdaq strategy.  Now make sure you go to the performance page of our website (the above turquoise coloured link) to get a much more detailed insight into some of the key aspects of the results. I think you’ll be impressed. Don't worry, there'll be plenty of links to direct you back to our campaign.                           ______________________________________________Top of Campaign                                    
Test Drive Investors Prophet


There's nothing like taking a car for a test drive. You jump behind the wheel excited with anticipation, while wondering what you'll be thinking when you next pull into the curb. We hope this test drive will be no different and that you’ll walk away satisfied. We won’t be jumping in a car but we’ll be assuming we started the New Year of 2014 with $50,000 of cash wanting to find a home in your portfolio.We’ll be starting off with an introduction about our approach towards investing and then do some revision about some of the key aspects of our S&P 500 strategy. Then we’ll be off for the test drive before having a look at the results. 
Test Drive Investors Prophet

You'll need to head over to the website to finish the test drive as it takes up way too much space, but believe me it's worth the read. So click on the above turquoise coloured link and jump in for a test drive.                             ______________________________________________                   
Our Bag of Articles


When deciding to invest you need to make sure you're armed with the right information and that you understand every aspect of your strategy. 

We are sure the following articles will go a long way to doing just this, so click on whichever image takes your fancy and you'll be directed to that page on our site. Don't worry, though, we've made sure you'll be able to easily find your way back here. So take the plunge and we'll see you on the other side.

Click on any of the following images to read an article




  

      


We're sure you found some food for thought amongst that lot. Now let's take time to go on a tour of the website.                       ___________Contribute___________
Top of Campaign                              
        

Website Tour


If you've got this far you should now have a good idea of how investing the IP Way works and how it can help you to become a profitable investor. 
So, if you haven’t already, it’s probably time for us to take you on a walk around our website. Here we’ll explain some of the key aspects of our service and show you how to make the best use of what we’ve got on offer. 
Please remember about two of the key reasons for campaigning on Indiegogo:

We need you to give us your wish list. What changes would you make and how you’d like the service look and operate. You'll get your chance via a survey shortly after the end of the campaign. 

We need to raise funds to implement the plans we have and any of your ideas that we can accommodate.

We’ll be making changes anyway, but this is your big chance to have your say about what you really think is important. So help us make it happen.


You should now have a good idea about the site's structure and navigation. Let's take some time to look at what you'll get as a subscriber.
                          ___________Contribute___________

                               


What Do You Get?


You'll get the opportunity to subscribe to a truly unique service that will help you in your journey towards becoming a more profitable investor. 
Carry on reading to see just how comprehensive our offer to you is. All perks will come with everything listed below with the only difference being the timeframe associated with each perk.
Access to the Entire Site

You’ll get access to the entire website which encompasses both strategies as well as all the educational material. It’s something that won’t be on offer again. Certainly not at the prices we’re offering on Indiegogo. Don’t forget that you will gain full access to the site from the day you fund a perk but your subscription period will only start after our campaign finishes. So make sure you contribute early to get the full benefit of the extra FREE time.  
Introductory Email Series

We'll explain the logic behind our investment philosophy and strategy. You’ll receive a series of four introductory emails that will set you up for an exciting journey towards profitable investing. By the end of the series you’ll have a complete understanding of how to invest the IP Way and you’ll know exactly what to do and when to do it.
Special Reports

Our Step by Step Guide to Profitable Investing: we look at some of the common traits of big time investors, the importance of knowing yourself and investing proactively before clearly stepping through each of the key aspects of being a profitable investor. It’s a must read to really understand the logic behind investing the IP Way.The Four Ps of Investing: OK making a profit is one of them, which we’re talk about at length, but without a good understanding of the others you’re likely to only be a temporary resident of the investing community. I’ll leave you to guess what the others are and I can guarantee this special report will be an interesting read.
Daily Buy and Sell Email Alerts

Everything we do is centred on our Buy and Sell alerts. If you want to invest the IP Way then you need to keep abreast of our daily alerts. The best way to do that is to check our Daily Buy and Sell Alert emails.We highlight the number of Buy and Sell alerts for each strategy and provide a link back to the website so you can view which companies have made the lists. 
Classroom Articles

Even though we are happy to do all the strategy based work for you, it’s imperative that you continually strive to learn and to broaden your knowledge base. We’ll welcome you into the classroom and provide weekly articles that are designed to focus your attention on the issues that really count. 
Portfolio Updates

Shortly after the end of each month we publish updates for each of our model portfolios. We start off by providing an overview of what sort of mood Mr Markets been in before digging a little deeper to see what’s really been happening. These updates provide a great insight into how to manage a portfolio the IP Way.                                   ___________Contribute___________
Top of Campaign                                    

Perks


I'm sure that you'll agree that we have a lot to offer and just to cement that view remember that every perk receives the following benefits. 



You'll receive



Complete Access to the site: including both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq strategies.

Two Special Reports (FREE):  'Our Step by Step Guide to Profitable Investing' and 'The Four Ps to Investing' are a must read to really understand the logic behind investing the IP Way.

Early Bird (FREE) Access Your subscription will only start when the campaign ends, but you'll have full access to the site from the day you fund your perk. So get in early as the extra time is ABSOLUTELY FREE.

Prices Won't Rise: We will honour the renewal, for up to 12 months, of all perks at the value at which the perk is originally purchased at.


Click on one of the images

What Do We Need?

This is where spell out our reasons for crowd funding on Indiegogo. Essentially we need to raise funds to upgrade our website and get to feedback from you. 

 The majority of the funds raised will be used to redesign the website and to make it mobile friendly. The changes will be centred on improving the functionality and speed of the service while also incorporating some of your ideas.We’re not putting a figure on the cost of any changes as we don’t know exactly what those changes will be or which ones we can afford, until we’ve heard back from you.
We need feedback
We’ve done all the hard work associated with developing and back-testing our strategy. We know it works so we now need to focus on providing the service for people like you.We want to listen to you. We’re keen to hear your suggestions about how to customise our service to best suit your needs. It’s not often that customers get to have a say about how they’d like a service to look and feel, but that’s exactly what we’re doing.So make sure you send in a comment with any suggestions and be sure to complete a small survey we’ll be sending out shortly after the end of the campaign.                                                   ___________Contribute___________


Risks/Timeline

Our campaign is slightly different to most others as Investors Prophet is already up and running which means you'll start receiving the full service from the day you fund a perk.At this stage we can't provide definitive timeline for when we expect the changes to be completed as many of them will be based on the feedback we get from you.The Special Reports will be available within one month of the campaign ending, while changes to the website will progressively be made over a six month period.
Access to website

The great thing about our campaign is that there is no waiting. You start to receive the full service from the day after you fund a perk. Even better is that your subscription period only starts from the end of the campaign. So the earlier you get started the more you get for FREE.
Risks

Investors Prophet is already up and running and the funds raised will primarily be used to improve the functionality and look and feel of the service. This, therefore, reduces most risks normally associated with designing and producing products that have yet to be completed.
 ___________Contribute___________
Top of Campaign

Our Team & Q&A

My name is Robert Carey and I'm the driving force behind Investors Prophet. I've been educating and guiding investors for over 25 years which has given me an innate understanding of what the most common pitfalls are and how to help people to become profitable investors.
Some Background
We've run out of space here so please follow the above turquoise coloured link to our website to read more about my background (including a mug shot) and that of our other team members.
Questions and Answers
You guessed it. We have to send you to our website (click on the above turquoise coloured  link) to check out our list of questions and answers. Finally, I'd like to say a big THANK YOU for showing an interest in Investors Prophet. I hope you decide to take up one of Perks. Either way I wish you luck on your journey to profitable investing.

story:
So, this is where I tell you my story huh?

So, to start, I've been a coffee addict since I was 12.  Navy issued instant coffee, and Starfox on SNES (i think?) and Streetfighter 2, kept me up til 3 or 4 am and the coffee was awesome.

Then it was Utopia Cafe through high school.  My buddies and I would end up there near daily, pool our money, get a pack of smokes, some fries, coffee, and play Kaiser all day.  I loved that place.

Since then I've been wanting to open my own place.  It's my dream. Slinging coffee all day and listening to Hendrix on my jukebox (i am determined to have a jukebox!)

So for the past year, I've gotten some more education (business finances, entrepreneurship, marketting, Human resourses, Quickbooks, book keeping, Food Safety, First Aid, Occupational Health and Safety, etc etc) and expanded my 'mini' business, making and selling jewellry.  (look up Traumahawk Jewellry, but beware, some of it ain't 'safe for work')

One of my setbacks was, well, I use a plain old 12 dollar drip coffee maker. I had NO clue how to make espresso or any other fancy drinks.  So i plead with Twitter, and Twitter gave me Dr. Coffee.

TLDR; she taught me the ways of the Force, and now I can make coffee.  I also got a booth at the Market she was in, and sold my jewellry there for a couple of months, as well as sold coffee at her booth.

Now, it's 2020, I retired from the Jewellry thing (well, backed away, my jewellry's still available), and my last setback is startup capital.

I budgetted it out, and I need 17 Grand to open a good booth full of coffee and pastries and such.    In order for me to get funds, loans, grants, etc, I need to have 5-10% of that.  about 800 bucks or so. 

Being unemployed, that's kind of hard. I have one pair of pants, a chipped tooth, medical expenses, rent, and, yah, I can't come up with startup 5% on top of it. 

 

I am going to be honest.

I hate asking for money.  I’m prideful.  And the world is burning and they could probably use your help more than I.  

But I'm at the point where I need to ask for help or my dream will be delayed by a LONG time and... well, if you feel like it, I'd be glad for the help.

 

I want to start small. I have a place selected, and a menu, all sorts of stuff.  I have the education and business sense to make it work. And I’m stubborn. After a couple of years, after I’ve paid off loans, I want to expand to a bigger place.  Just thinking about it gives me such joy. OMG the music and the food and the coffee, and comfy chairs and feeding people. Squee!

This little place will be as environmentally sustainable as I can do.  Cups and lids and clamshells, all compostable.  Bringing your own travel mug will get you a discount.  No straws.  I will take all food waste that I can (including coffee grounds) home to compost and use in our garden.

The location is inside a Market full of local small businesses.  I believe that with a cafe in there it will help draw more people.  What better smell than fresh ground beans and mini donuts?  Mutually beneficial!  

I just need some help getting to this first step.  5% of the total amount I need to open. $800 bucks.  That $800 is my first priority.  After that, anything else I get will be put towards dental funds and rent. I’ll wear my one pair of pants til I can buy new ones.  Hell I’ll wear my summer shorts hahah.

If you can spare five bucks and don’t mind taking a chance on some strange Metis chick from Saskatchewan, I’d sure appreciate the help.  If you’re in Regina, I’ll take your name and your first coffee is on me.  I’ll keep everything updated on my social media (twitter, fb and Instagram)

story:
Short summary

The Non-Profit Association "Je cours pour Lilian" (I Run for Lilian) was created in November 2013 by people close to Lilian, in the town of Cogolin, France, near Saint Tropez.

Lilian is a little smiling boy with mischievous sparkling eyes. He just wants to enjoy life and be able to run and play with his friends and cousins.

He was born May 24, 2012 with a complete bilateral cleft lip and palate, severe plagiocephaly and congenital legs folded on his stomach torticollis.

Thereafter, he was diagnosed with, in addition, central sleep apnea and an overly narrow occipitocervical junction with risk of compression of the spinal cord.

See him trying to walk below (he is almost 2 and a half and shoud run as every little child of his age) :


Since his birth his parents struggle to give him the best care but everything has a price. As time passes, the risk of psychomotor delay for Lilian increase.

Lilian's mother and two of her friends are fans of running. Pushed by people around them they decided to create the Association to try to take care of (at least part of) Lilian's medical expenses.

The name of the Association was created according to the following idea : "Instead of running for us, why not run for Lilian ?"

Above all, our will is to do everything we can for Lilian so he can RUN one day.

The Association is committed since November 2013 to help Lilian's family and give a long-term help to other children with same diseases.

Today, there are many structures to separately deal with various Lilian's diseases but very few structures deal with all diseases at the same time and unfortunately they do not have the right answers for Lilian and other children with same diseases.

The whole small village of Cogolin in France has mobilized for Lilian and some surrounding communities did so, but now we need your help so Lilian's disease can be known worldwide and globally shared with other countries.

Even Doctor Jorandon, Lilian's Cogolin Doctor, ran in New York City Marathon this year for Lilian ! See photo below :

And many other unknown people ran marathons with the Official T-Shirt from the association "Je cours pour Lilian" (I Run For Lilian) :

We would like to help Lilian and children with same diseases to get a chance to find answers and solutions to heal one day. This is why we would need your help !


What We Need

We need to raise as soon as possible about $ 15.065 to allow Lilian to follow emergency care in Barcelona, the only European center adapted to this kind of disease. This neuro-rehabilitation program in Barcelona is called "Essentis Program".

You can visit Essentis official webpage to understand the kind of care children like Lilian are following in this center (see http://www.metodoessentis.com/info.php?sec=142&idioma=en) but you have to know that, during the sessions, the patient goes through various workshops in which posture, disability and symptoms are evaluated by different members of Essentis' team (osteopaths, acupuncturists, Physiotherapists ...) to develop a personalized program adapted to children's needs.

Different therapists work in coordination within the center and the team of Dr. Nazarov (myiotenofaciectomie), that of Dr. Lao (geneticist) and Dr. Cori Lopez (neurologist), Windoor (Empuriabrava), which enables a rapid response to the needs of daily patient.

The Essentis patient approach is holistic, meaning it is considered in its entirety.

Essentis is the only program we know that is able to treat all the symptoms of the disease at the same time.


We would also need SPLINTS, SPECIAL SHOES, and a GATEADOR, a support allowing children with this disease to walk with 4 legs almost alone.

     


Why $ 15.065 ?

A stay at the neuro-rehabilitation center in Barcelona costs about $ 3.800 (travel from Cogolin to Barcelona included) per 15 days periods of treatment. 

Lilian ideally needs 3 stays in a whole year to enable him to achieve real progress in traction, which makes : $ 3.800 x 3 curing sessions = $ 11.400.

Besides : 

- the splints we need cost about $ 1.300, 

- the special shoes cost about $ 200,

- and the gateador costs about $ 200.

Subtotal needed : $ 13.100

The Indiegogo fees are about 15% (third party fees included and additional currency exchange fees not included), that is 15% x $ 13.100 = $ 1.965.

Total needed = $ 15.065.

Of course we would be glad to raise a little bit more because it would allow us to offer Lilian more care for 2015 and also appropriate toys for his age for Christmas 2014.

Lilian's mother is a modest woman and can not afford to pay for everything. Your hand would be welcome to help Lilian and help Lilian's mother, Elodie, find hope for her son.

Unfortunately, the French health care system does not pay back these kind of expenses because Lilian's disease is totally unknown in France.


What you get

You get according to the amount of your donation : our deepest thanks, a Desktop Wallpaper, a movie with our thanks, Official bracelets marked "Je cours pour Lilian", your name on a Facebook Film or Official T-shirts marked "Je cours pour Lilian" from the Association.

See details below against.

Official "Je cours pour Lilian" Limited T-shirt (on the left it is Elodie, Lilian's mother) : 

Official "Je cours pour Lilian" Limited Fabric Bracelets we have made for donors (see below against) :


What you get in case of failure to achieve the objective of funds raised

In case of failure to achieve the objective of the funds raised, we will still use the funds raised left for Lilian's care, and counterparties claimed will be still honored. 

Risks and Challenges

· You have to know that we have done this kind of project only in France. 

We have been raising some funds in France with help of friends of us. Now we need YOU to get those funds, that is why we are looking for your help !

Other ways to help !

We know that everyone will not be able to contribute to our project, but you can still help ! 

Talk about our project to your friends and tell them also to generate ads for our project.

We also need you to help us get this project to be known and discovered. Talk around !

Feel free to use our communication tools to connect us to you and learn more about us : 

  • Our website (about us, our association) : http://www.je-cours-pour-lilian.com
  • Our blog with news our association : http://je-cours-pour-lilian.over-blog.com
  • Facebook (our everyday life) : https://www.facebook.com/JecourspourLilian
  • And of course do not forget to use sharing tools from Indiegogo ! These are the most powerful ones for sure ! 
  • Thank you, thank you, and thank you again for your help and attention.
story_txt:
Short summary

The Non-Profit Association "Je cours pour Lilian" (I
Run for Lilian) was created in November 2013 by people close to
Lilian, in the town of Cogolin, France, near Saint Tropez.
Lilian is a little smiling boy with mischievous sparkling eyes. He just wants to enjoy life and be able to run and play with his friends and cousins.He was born May 24, 2012 with a complete bilateral cleft lip and palate, severe plagiocephaly and congenital legs folded on his stomach torticollis.Thereafter, he was diagnosed with, in addition, central sleep apnea and an overly narrow occipitocervical junction with risk of compression of the spinal cord.See him trying to walk below (he is almost 2 and a half and shoud run as every little child of his age) :Since his birth his parents struggle to give him the best care but everything has a price. As time passes, the risk of psychomotor delay for Lilian increase.Lilian's mother and two of her friends are fans of running. Pushed by people around them they decided to create the Association to try to take care of (at least part of) Lilian's medical expenses.
The name of the Association was created according to
the following idea : "Instead of running for us, why not run for Lilian
?"


Above all, our will is to do everything we can for Lilian so he can RUN one day.

The Association is committed since November 2013 to help Lilian's family and give a long-term help to other children with same diseases.
Today, there are many structures to separately deal with various Lilian's diseases but very few structures deal with all diseases at the same time and unfortunately they do not have the right answers for Lilian and other children with same diseases.
The whole small village of Cogolin in France has mobilized for Lilian and some surrounding communities did so, but now we need your help so Lilian's disease can be known worldwide and globally shared with other countries.


Even Doctor Jorandon, Lilian's Cogolin Doctor, ran in New York City Marathon this year for Lilian ! See photo below :


And many other unknown people ran marathons with the Official T-Shirt from the association "Je cours pour Lilian" (I Run For Lilian) :


We would like to help Lilian and children with same diseases to get a chance to find answers and solutions to heal one day. This is why we would need your help !

Lilian ideally needs 3
stays in a whole year to enable him to achieve real progress in traction,
which makes : $ 3.800 x 3 curing sessions = $ 11.400.
Besides : 
- the splints we need cost about $ 1.300, 
- the special shoes cost about $ 200,
- and the gateador costs about $ 200.

included and additional currency exchange fees not included), that is 15% x $ 13.100 = $ 1.965.

pour Lilian", your name on a Facebook Film or Official T-shirts
marked "Je cours pour Lilian" from the Association.

story:
Me along with my family is trying to raise money for a memorial for my 20 year old cousin Julius Rivera. Who was shot yesterday March 23,2015 at 6pm in hartford ct. Julius left behind a beautiful 6 Month old daughter name Mariah,  his girlfriend Ashya, his mother, his two sisters and brother. We still are trying to figure out who did it but till then no further information will be released. This was an unexpected tragedy for all of us in our family so right now we are low on money. If you can help my family by donating. Even if it's $1 or even $5 we would really appreciate it. We are seriously trying to have his funeral by this week if possible. Thank you so much for your time and please share this. HELP SPREAD THE WORD. 
After paying off the funeral, the rest of the money will be for his daughter. 


If you have any futher information please feel free to call my aunt Celine's Deleon 8608909625.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Stephen, I  come from Kenya and in my village, I'm the fifth to ever study up to university level. I graduated with a bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering in April this year. I am a role model to many of my people and I feel that I should do something that will inspire them and change their mindset about success in life.

Instead of looking for a job in the city and live my life like most people have done, I wish to start a small project back in the village that will inspire people and change their mindset about success. My sister and I have decided to start an indigenous chicken farming project. For the last three months, we have been researching, studying and collecting relevant information about poultry farming in our country. Right now, we have all the necessary information and plan on how to start this project and make it successful. As per our 5-year business plan, we need $7,000 to successfully start the project and operate it for the first one year. We are very confident that the project will be successful. We are one of those people who sacrifice everything to ensure that what they focus on succeeds.

The main reason why we chose this project is because poultry farming is very common back at home, only that people do not commercialize it. Therefore we want to inspire and show them that if they decide to do it commercially and professionally, it can change their lives tremendously

If we had powers, we would reward hugely anybody who will support us but for now all we are requesting is to give us a helping hand. We are targeting about 7000 people so that if everyone supports us with $1, we will have achieved our target; if we get 467 people each supporting us with $15, we will have achieved our goal too. Our main belief is in crowdfunding. Thus it doesn't matter how small or big your contribution is. Every support will mean a change to lives of many people here at home. You will forever be honored and celebrated for having been part of this change that we wish to bring.

Also, please help us spread the word and join us on social media so that we can share more.


What We Need & What You Get

What we need and what you will get

We are raising $7,000 (capital) for general starting of our community poultry farming project. This money will be used for constructing a poultry house, purchasing equipment, purchasing chicks, paying for some legal fees for and catering for some expenses during the first year of the project. We will set up the project in our local farm back at home

You will get lasting fame and honor with your name on the gratitude wall of the project and always be listed among the principal supporters of the project. You will also be part of the community forever and we will establish a day which my community will be celebrating supporters of this project on annual basis. We are hopeful that one day, some of you will attend this event here, share the joy and see the impact you will have made

What if we don’t reach our funding goal? The money you contribute will be used to cater for the construction of the poultry house and purchase of equipment. You will still be supporting this local project and changing people’s lives forever

What if we surpass our funding goal? Any money above our goal will be used to purchase more chicks. According to our plan, we want to start with 200 chicks and increase them to 1000 chicks in 3 years. If we get more funds than our goal, we will increase the number of chicks to start with


The Impact

This project will support the local community in changing the mindset of people especially youths on success in life. Youths within our community have a fixed mind that you cannot live a decent life if you don’t have a white collar job. We are among the less than 10 people who have studied to university level within our community. I would really wish to help my community by inspiring them. Instead of living in the city and only going home occasionally, we want to start a small project back at home. We need $7,000 to start the community poultry farming project. We are confident and motivated to make this project successful. Once we achieve that, we will have started a long journey of transforming our community. We need your support because getting a loan here in our country when you are not employed is next to impossible. That is why we are requesting for your support, in any way. We will be humbled for any kind of support; monetary or motivational, 


Risks & Challenges

Chicken rearing is subject to various diseases but the good news is that there are vaccines that have been discovered to overcome this challenge. We are going to run this project by ourselves and with the dedication and hard work we have, we will ensure that every challenge that comes along is handled in the best way possible. We will purchase vaccination equipment and be in contact with veterinary officers who will be visiting the farm frequently to check the health of our poultry and give recommendations. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the word by forwarding this campaign to your family, friends, co-workers, bosses or organizations who would wish to make an impact on the entire community and be honored for their support. Share this Indiegogo campaign on your online and offline contacts. Use Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.  


The faith you will have in us will be a great challenge for us to devote ourselves for the success of the project. You will help our community realize the sweetness of success and change their mindset forever. Thank you in advance for your support and be blessed.

story:
What is the Global Intimate?

The Global Intimate is a research initiative that actively pursues the re-imagination of world politics today. The collective was formed in 2013 by students and faculty from The New School (New York, NY) with a shared vision: to transform the foundation that underpins today's international system by thinking creatively about world politics. 


We believe that in this historical moment, a paradigm shift for international engagement is not only imperative- it is imminent. It is critical that international relations theory and practice evolve from divisive and coercive mentalities, towards a model of engagement that is holistic, balanced and values human-flourishing above all else. 

The Global Intimate utilizes alternative lenses to examine world politics today. Instead of re-enforcing narratives of self-interest, power politics, and divisions between public/private, inside/outside and history/myth- this research initiative explores topics such as food and the ancient Silk Road to re-imagine problem-solving in the international arena. Our inquiries explore how these two entry points, food and the Silk Road, offer an ethos where engagement between different cultures and peoples occur without resort to conflict or domination. "Difference", in other words, should not always be associated with behaviors such as "exile" or "alienation". Rather, difference in today's international system offers a source of learning, adaptation, absorption, circulation and co-constitution. The Global Intimate, therefore, aims to re-position politics as a relational experience for all.

Below is a clip on our beginnings (formerly called "An Evening on the Silk Road"):


(To see more videos to learn about who we are, click on the Gallery tab on the top of this page.)

To date, the momentum of The Global Intimate has been unprecedented. Recently, the collective was invited to share its journey and findings at the 2015 annual convening of the International Studies Association- the world's largest network of scholars, practitioners and students in this field. Exposure to leading academics and scholars in the field introduces the ideas of The Global Intimate in an official capacity to educators of international relations students- present and future. The ripple effect has already begun!

Support for The Global Intimate provides the opportunity to ignite change in the way international relations is taught, conceived of, and practiced. Its impact is not only on professional politicians- its transformation reaches all of humanity in today's globalized world. The paradigm shift continues here. 


Horizons & Activities

The Global Intimate is evolving. Once a for-credit class, this research initiative now seeks to share its exciting and creative ideas with the world. Support for The Global Intimate will provide the following opportunities:

  • The Global South Caucus International Studies (GSCIS) Conference, Singapore, January 2015- Attendance for our team of 14 individuals to present our findings and innovative concepts to the field's leading scholars, practitioners and students. 
  • Presentation at Jawarhalal Nehru University (JNU), New Delhi, January 2015- The Global Intimate has been invited to present a workshop at JNU, India's premier university. All local hospitality costs will be provided, however we need to provide our own airfare from Singapore following the GSCIS Conference. 
  • Academic Research- Our group is committed to researching, producing and disseminating cutting-edge concepts (like "difference without alienation" described above) to build a new future for world politics. This includes the maintenance of our blog, continued production of our documentary tracking the journey of this educational experiment, publication of our papers into scholarly journals, and a book manuscript that will serve as the foundation for future works. 
  • Summer 2015 Community Short Course- Learning about international relations is not only for registered students! In Summer 2015, The Global Intimate will be offering a summer short course in partnership with The New School in New York, NY to community members and anyone interested on how to think creatively about international relations. This course is an adaptation of our sessions on the Silk Road and food- sure to tantalize the appetites of all.
In the event that we do not raise enough funds to present our materials in Singapore and New Delhi, The Global Intimate will dedicate all funds to  support the production  and dissemination of the project documentary. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Learn more about us and help spread the word! The Global Intimate is built on love for humanity and we will not rest until our international system reflects this. Be a part of the transformation by spreading the love in the following ways: 

  • Share our efforts and tell people about The Global Intimate. We are here to make world politics interesting, exciting, fun and sexy again!
  • Visit and share the links to our sites below: Facebook, YouTube & Silk Road WordPress!
  • Be a part of the spark by spreading the word about this campaign using the Indie Go-Go share tools at the top of this page.
